2021.author: Charlie Chaplin
2021.quote: To truly laugh, you must be able to take your pain, and play with it!

2022.author: Charlie Chaplin
2022.quote: Nothing is permanent in this wicked world - not even our troubles.

2023.author: Charlie Chaplin
2023.quote: Life could be wonderful if people would leave you alone.

2024.author: Charlie Chaplin
2024.quote: Life is a tragedy when seen in close-up, but a comedy in long-shot.

2025.author: Charlie Chaplin
2025.quote: Words are cheap. The biggest thing you can say is 'elephant'.

2026.author: Charlie Chaplin
2026.quote: Laughter is the tonic, the relief, the surcease for pain.

2027.author: Charlie Chaplin
2027.quote: The saddest thing I can imagine is to get used to luxury.

2028.author: Charlie Chaplin
2028.quote: In the end, everything is a gag.

2029.author: Charlie Chaplin
2029.quote: What do you want a meaning for? Life is a desire, not a meaning.

2030.author: Charlie Chaplin
2030.quote: I do not have much patience with a thing of beauty that must be explained to be understood. If it does need additional interpretation by someone other than the creator, then I question whether it has fulfilled its purpose.

2031.author: Charlie Chaplin
2031.quote: All I need to make a comedy is a park, a policeman and a pretty girl.

2032.author: Charlie Chaplin
2032.quote: Despair is a narcotic. It lulls the mind into indifference.

2033.author: Charlie Chaplin
2033.quote: Failure is unimportant. It takes courage to make a fool of yourself.

2034.author: Charlie Chaplin
2034.quote: This is a ruthless world and one must be ruthless to cope with it.

2035.author: Charlie Chaplin
2035.quote: We think too much and feel too little.

2036.author: Charlie Chaplin
2036.quote: Dictators free themselves, but they enslave the people.

2037.author: Charlie Chaplin
2037.quote: All my pictures are built around the idea of getting in trouble and so giving me the chance to be desperately serious in my attempt to appear as a normal little gentleman.

2038.author: Charlie Chaplin
2038.quote: The glamour of it all! New York! America!

2039.author: Charlie Chaplin
2039.quote: Man as an individual is a genius. But men in the mass form the headless monster, a great, brutish idiot that goes where prodded.

2040.author: Charlie Chaplin
2040.quote: I suppose that's one of the ironies of life doing the wrong thing at the right moment.

2041.author: Charlie Chaplin
2041.quote: I remain just one thing, and one thing only, and that is a clown. It places me on a far higher plane than any politician.

2042.author: Charlie Chaplin
2042.quote: To help a friend in need is easy, but to give him your time is not always opportune.

2043.author: Charlie Chaplin
2043.quote: I have no further use for America. I wouldn't go back there if Jesus Christ was President.

2044.author: Christie Brinkley
2044.quote: Share your smile with the world. It's a symbol of friendship and peace.

2045.author: Christie Brinkley
2045.quote: I believe in true love, and I believe in happy endings. And I believe.

2046.author: Christie Brinkley
2046.quote: My smile has been my ticket to the world. Smiling releases the same feel-good hormones you get jogging. Caring for your lips and gums is important. I brush my teeth morning and night, alternating toothpaste brands. In addition to flossing, I use a Water Pik to massage my gums and remove food particles.

2047.author: Christie Brinkley
2047.quote: Smile. It instantly lifts the face, and it just lights up the room.

2048.author: Christie Brinkley
2048.quote: I'd rather have a broken arm than a broken heart.

2049.author: Christie Brinkley
2049.quote: Adopting a really positive attitude can work wonders to adding years to your life, a spring to your step, a sparkle to your eye, and all of that.

2050.author: Christie Brinkley
2050.quote: I think many people can relate to that excruciating pain of love gone wrong. I'd rather have a broken arm than a broken heart.

2051.author: Christie Brinkley
2051.quote: At Thanksgiving, I always start at the top of my list and say I'm grateful for friends, family, and good health. Then I get more superficial... like being thankful for my Louboutins.

2052.author: Christie Brinkley
2052.quote: When you feel good, you look good. And vice versa: When you look good, you feel good.

2053.author: Christie Brinkley
2053.quote: I've always believed in a rainbow diet. As many colors and foods as you can eat, the better, because if you focus on one food, there's bound to be a report that comes out that says, 'Broccoli actually... ' So I mix it up a lot. And I take vitamins, like Biosil, which I take for my hair, skin, and nails.

2054.author: Christie Brinkley
2054.quote: A smile is like an instant facelift and an instant mood lift.

2055.author: Christie Brinkley
2055.quote: Some people think happiness is a luxury, but it's a necessity. You need to make space for it in your life.

2056.author: Christie Brinkley
2056.quote: I love musicians. I think artists are the most amazing people because they're constantly creating beauty for the world. With all the crazy stuff going on in the world, then there's artists reminding us of our humanity and reminding us of our heart and soul and what really matters.

2057.author: Christie Brinkley
2057.quote: I really believe in the old expression that what doesn't kill you makes you stronger. It's through adversity that you find the strength you never knew you had.

2058.author: Christie Brinkley
2058.quote: Life is too short to not have oysters and champagne sometimes.

2059.author: Christie Brinkley
2059.quote: Lunch is a big huge salad with every color in it. From leafy greens to purple to herbs, fresh cut herbs mixed into it for flavors. I vary what I toss into it. Sometimes it might be lentils and chopped tomatoes, other days it could be garbanzo beans, some days I might have just a salad and have some lentil soup on the side.

2060.author: Christie Brinkley
2060.quote: When you feel great, you emanate a certain energy that translates as beautiful. I don't care if you have the standard beauty or not; it's that X-factor that comes through, and the basis of that is good health.

2061.author: Christie Brinkley
2061.quote: I photographed all kinds of sports - Formula 1, Formula Atlantic. And anybody who knows me knows that, from the day they invented video cameras, I used to lug them around when you had to carry the pack here and the big camera here, plus the diaper bag and a baby and the purse or whatever.

2062.author: Christie Brinkley
2062.quote: Just because people can express themselves through their art doesn't mean they are great communicators in person.

2063.author: Christie Brinkley
2063.quote: When you turn 60, the key is to not stop moving. Once you start to stop moving, you rust. You got to just keep going.

2064.author: Christie Brinkley
2064.quote: Believe me, I love a good chocolate chip ice cream. I'm not going to go for some lousy version of it. If I'm going to have it, I'm going to have a really good one. I believe in treating yourself occasionally to something.

2065.author: Christie Brinkley
2065.quote: You don't always have to get an expensive gym membership. The important thing is to keep moving and to make it fun and have variety - it's the spice of life.

2066.author: Christie Brinkley
2066.quote: I really believe that being flexible and grateful contributes a lot to your happiness, which contributes to your health and contributes to your look.

2067.author: Christie Brinkley
2067.quote: I had a gorgeous mom. She was beautiful, so I lucked out there.

2068.author: Christie Brinkley
2068.quote: I've gotten into the habit of cranking out a set of push-ups before each show to get my blood pumping and find my focus. I worked my way up from eight to 30. That was a real accomplishment.

2069.author: Christie Brinkley
2069.quote: I liberally apply sunscreen and wear hats.

2070.author: Christopher Hitchens
2070.quote: Owners of dogs will have noticed that, if you provide them with food and water and shelter and affection, they will think you are God. Whereas owners of cats are compelled to realize that, if you provide them with food and water and affection, they draw the conclusion that they are God.

2071.author: Christopher Hitchens
2071.quote: What can be asserted without evidence can be dismissed without evidence.

2072.author: Christopher Hitchens
2072.quote: There are all kinds of stupid people that annoy me but what annoys me most is a lazy argument.

2073.author: Christopher Hitchens
2073.quote: Solidarity is an attitude of resistance, I suppose, or it should be.

2074.author: Christopher Hitchens
2074.quote: A gentleman is never rude except on purpose - I can honestly be nasty sober, believe you me.

2075.author: Christopher Hitchens
2075.quote: In one way, I suppose, I have been 'in denial' for some time, knowingly burning the candle at both ends and finding that it often gives a lovely light.

2076.author: Christopher Hitchens
2076.quote: The term 'the American Left' is as near to being meaningless or nonsensical as any term could really be in politics. It isn't really a force in politics anymore. And it would do well to ask itself why that is.

2077.author: Christopher Hitchens
2077.quote: My own view is that this planet is used as a penal colony, lunatic asylum and dumping ground by a superior civilisation, to get rid of the undesirable and unfit. I can't prove it, but you can't disprove it either.

2078.author: Christopher Hitchens
2078.quote: Religion is part of the human make-up. It's also part of our cultural and intellectual history. Religion was our first attempt at literature, the texts, our first attempt at cosmology, making sense of where we are in the universe, our first attempt at health care, believing in faith healing, our first attempt at philosophy.

2079.author: Christopher Hitchens
2079.quote: Millions of people die every day. Everyone's got to go sometime. I've came by this particular tumor honestly. If you smoke, which I did for many years very heavily with occasional interruption, and if you use alcohol, you make yourself a candidate for it in your sixties.

2080.author: Christopher Hitchens
2080.quote: Many parents and teachers have become irritated to the point of distraction at the way the weed-style growth of 'like' has spread through the idiom of the young. And it's true that in some cases the term has become simultaneously a crutch and a tic, driving out the rest of the vocabulary as candy expels vegetables.

2081.author: Christopher Hitchens
2081.quote: You know, you can make a small mistake in language or etiquette in Britain, or you could when I was younger, and really be made to feel it, and it's the flick of a lash, but it would sting, and especially at school where there's not much privacy, and so on. You could, yes, undoubtedly be made to feel crushed.

2082.author: Christopher McCandless
2082.quote: So many people live within unhappy circumstances and yet will not take the initiative to change their situation because they are conditioned to a life of security, conformity, and conservation, all of which may appear to give one peace of mind, but in reality, nothing is more damaging to the adventurous spirit.

2083.author: Christopher McCandless
2083.quote: No phone. No pool. No pets. No cigarettes. Ultimate freedom... No longer to be poisoned by civilization, he flees, and walks alone upon the land to become Lost in the Wild.

2084.author: Christopher McCandless
2084.quote: The joy of life comes from our encounters with new experiences, and hence there is no greater joy than to have an endlessly changing horizon, for each day to have a new and different sun.

2085.author: Christopher McCandless
2085.quote: The very basic core of a man's living spirit is his passion for adventure.

2086.author: Christopher McCandless
2086.quote: I have had a happy life and thank the Lord. Goodbye and may God bless all!

2087.author: Christopher McCandless
2087.quote: Tramping is too easy with all this money. My days were more exciting when I was penniless and had to forage around for my next meal... I've decided that I'm going to live this life for some time to come. The freedom and simple beauty of it is just too good to pass up.

2088.author: Christopher McCandless
2088.quote: I need your help. I am injured, near death, and too weak to hike out of here. I am all alone. This is no joke. In the name of God, please remain to save me. I am out collecting berries close by and shall return this evening. Thank you, Chris McCandless.

2089.author: Christopher McCandless
2089.quote: It is the experiences, the great triumphant joy of living to the fullest extent in which real meaning is found. God it's great to be alive!

2090.author: Christopher McCandless
2090.quote: I don't want to know what time it is. I don't want to know what day it is or where I am. None of that matters.

2091.author: Christopher McCandless
2091.quote: Happiness is only real when shared.

2092.author: Christopher McCandless
2092.quote: Circumstance has no value. It is how one relates to a situation that has value. All true meaning resides in the personal relationship to a phenomenon... what it means to you.

2093.author: Christopher McCandless
2093.quote: I now walk into the wild.

2094.author: Christopher McCandless
2094.quote: All true meaning resides in the personal relationship to a phenomenon, what it means to you.

2095.author: Clint Eastwood
2095.quote: Respect your efforts, respect yourself. Self-respect leads to self-discipline. When you have both firmly under your belt, that's real power.

2096.author: Clint Eastwood
2096.quote: They say marriages are made in Heaven. But so is thunder and lightning.

2097.author: Clint Eastwood
2097.quote: There's a rebel lying deep in my soul.

2098.author: Clint Eastwood
2098.quote: I have a very strict gun control policy: if there's a gun around, I want to be in control of it.

2099.author: Clint Eastwood
2099.quote: You should never give up your inner self.

2100.author: Clint Eastwood
2100.quote: What you put into life is what you get out of it.

2101.author: Clint Eastwood
2101.quote: The innocence of childhood is like the innocence of a lot of animals.

2102.author: Clint Eastwood
2102.quote: If you want a guarantee, buy a toaster.

2104.author: Clint Eastwood
2104.quote: You have to feel confident. If you don't, then you're going to be hesitant and defensive, and there'll be a lot of things working against you.

2105.author: Clint Eastwood
2105.quote: When you're young, you're very reckless. Then you get conservative. Then you get reckless again.

2106.author: Clint Eastwood
2106.quote: When I did 'Bird,' it was a surprise to some people, first because I wasn't in it and second because most of the films I'd been doing were cop movies or westerns or adventure films, so to be doing one about Charlie Parker, who was a great influence on American music, was a great thrill for me.

2107.author: Clint Eastwood
2107.quote: If you think it's going to rain, it will.

2108.author: Clint Eastwood
2108.quote: I was drafted during the Korean War. None of us wanted to go... It was only a couple of years after World War II had ended. We said, 'Wait a second? Didn't we just get through with that?'

2109.author: Clint Eastwood
2109.quote: There's only one way to have a happy marriage and as soon as I learn what it is I'll get married again.

2110.author: Clint Eastwood
2110.quote: I don't like to see a president who is just out campaigning all year long or for the last four years. I'd like to see somebody who's going in the office. In fact, I'd like to not see them because that way you'd be sure that they'd be working.

2111.author: Clint Eastwood
2111.quote: I just think it is important that you realize, that you're the best in the world. Whether you are a Democrat or Republican or whether you're libertarian or whatever, you are the best. And we should not ever forget that. And when somebody does not do the job, we got to let them go.

2112.author: Clint Eastwood
2112.quote: I keep working because I learn something new all the time.

2113.author: Clint Eastwood
2113.quote: The prospect of dating someone in her twenties becomes less appealing as you get older. At some point in your life, your tolerance level goes down and you realize that, with someone much younger, there's nothing really to talk about.

2114.author: Clint Eastwood
2114.quote: My whole life has been one big improvisation.

2115.author: Clint Eastwood
2115.quote: Winning the election is a good-news, bad-news kind of thing. Okay, now you're the mayor. The bad news is, now you're the mayor.

2116.author: Clint Eastwood
2116.quote: I tried being reasonable, I didn't like it.

2117.author: Clint Eastwood
2117.quote: God gave you a brain. Do the best you can with it. And you don't have to be Einstein, but Einstein was mentally tough. He believed what he believed. And he worked out things. And he argued with people who disagreed with him. But I'm sure he didn't call everybody jerks.

2118.author: Clint Eastwood
2118.quote: There are two kinds of people in this world. 'I' people and 'we' people. I've always tried to be a 'we' person.

2119.author: Clint Eastwood
2119.quote: It takes tremendous discipline to control the influence, the power you have over other people's lives.

2120.author: Clint Eastwood
2120.quote: The guys who won World War II and that whole generation have disappeared, and now we have a bunch of teenage twits.

2121.author: Coco Chanel
2121.quote: A girl should be two things: classy and fabulous.

2122.author: Coco Chanel
2122.quote: Fashion fades, only style remains the same.

2123.author: Coco Chanel
2123.quote: In order to be irreplaceable one must always be different.

2124.author: Coco Chanel
2124.quote: Elegance does not consist in putting on a new dress.

2125.author: Coco Chanel
2125.quote: Fashion is not something that exists in dresses only. Fashion is in the sky, in the street, fashion has to do with ideas, the way we live, what is happening.

2126.author: Coco Chanel
2126.quote: Guilt is perhaps the most painful companion of death.

2127.author: Coco Chanel
2127.quote: Fashion is architecture: it is a matter of proportions.

2128.author: Coco Chanel
2128.quote: Luxury must be comfortable, otherwise it is not luxury.

2129.author: Coco Chanel
2129.quote: Don't spend time beating on a wall, hoping to transform it into a door.

2130.author: Coco Chanel
2130.quote: Success is often achieved by those who don't know that failure is inevitable.

2131.author: Coco Chanel
2131.quote: A women who doesn't wear perfume has no future.

2132.author: Coco Chanel
2132.quote: My friends, there are no friends.

2133.author: Coco Chanel
2133.quote: How many cares one loses when one decides not to be something but to be someone.

2134.author: Coco Chanel
2134.quote: Gentleness doesn't get work done unless you happen to be a hen laying eggs.

2135.author: Coco Chanel
2135.quote: There are people who have money and people who are rich.

2136.author: Coco Chanel
2136.quote: Hard times arouse an instinctive desire for authenticity.

2137.author: Coco Chanel
2137.quote: I am not young but I feel young. The day I feel old, I will go to bed and stay there. J'aime la vie! I feel that to live is a wonderful thing.

2138.author: Coco Chanel
2138.quote: Some people think luxury is the opposite of poverty. It is not. It is the opposite of vulgarity.

2139.author: Coco Chanel
2139.quote: Look for the woman in the dress. If there is no woman, there is no dress.

2140.author: Coco Chanel
2140.quote: Elegance is not the prerogative of those who have just escaped from adolescence, but of those who have already taken possession of their future.

2141.author: Coco Chanel
2141.quote: I never wanted to weigh more heavily on a man than a bird.

2143.author: Coco Chanel
2143.quote: There have been several Duchesses of Westminster but there is only one Chanel!

2144.author: Coco Chanel
2144.quote: The most courageous act is still to think for yourself. Aloud.

2145.author: Coco Chanel
2145.quote: Nature gives you the face you have at twenty; it is up to you to merit the face you have at fifty.

2146.author: Coco Chanel
2146.quote: As long as you know men are like children, you know everything!

2147.author: Colin Powell
2147.quote: A dream doesn't become reality through magic; it takes sweat, determination and hard work.

2148.author: Colin Powell
2148.quote: Success is the result of perfection, hard work, learning from failure, loyalty, and persistence.

2149.author: Colin Powell
2149.quote: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.

2150.author: Colin Powell
2150.quote: Children need to get a high-quality education, avoid violence and the criminal-justice system, and gain jobs. But they deserve more. We want them to learn not only reading and math but fairness, caring, self-respect, family commitment, and civic duty.

2151.author: Colin Powell
2151.quote: Leadership is solving problems. The day soldiers stop bringing you their problems is the day you have stopped leading them. They have either lost confidence that you can help or concluded you do not care. Either case is a failure of leadership.

2152.author: Colin Powell
2152.quote: If you are going to achieve excellence in big things, you develop the habit in little matters. Excellence is not an exception, it is a prevailing attitude.

2153.author: Colin Powell
2153.quote: Perpetual optimism is a force multiplier.

2154.author: Colin Powell
2154.quote: Don't bother people for help without first trying to solve the problem yourself.

2155.author: Colin Powell
2155.quote: Great leaders are almost always great simplifiers, who can cut through argument, debate and doubt, to offer a solution everybody can understand.

2156.author: Colin Powell
2156.quote: You're not just voting for an individual, in my judgment, you're voting for an agenda. You're voting for a platform. You're voting for a political philosophy.

2157.author: Colin Powell
2157.quote: Diplomacy is listening to what the other guy needs. Preserving your own position, but listening to the other guy. You have to develop relationships with other people so when the tough times come, you can work together.

2158.author: Colin Powell
2158.quote: Surround yourself with people who take their work seriously, but not themselves, those who work hard and play hard.

2159.author: Colin Powell
2159.quote: It ain't as bad as you think. It will look better in the morning.

2160.author: Colin Powell
2160.quote: Giving back involves a certain amount of giving up.

2161.author: Colin Powell
2161.quote: I think whether you're having setbacks or not, the role of a leader is to always display a winning attitude.

2162.author: Colin Powell
2162.quote: The healthiest competition occurs when average people win by putting above average effort.

2163.author: Colin Powell
2163.quote: Fit no stereotypes. Don't chase the latest management fads. The situation dictates which approach best accomplishes the team's mission.

2164.author: Colin Powell
2164.quote: Indeed, we're strongest when the face of America isn't only a soldier carrying a gun but also a diplomat negotiating peace, a Peace Corps volunteer bringing clean water to a village, or a relief worker stepping off a cargo plane as floodwaters rise.

2165.author: Colin Powell
2165.quote: Bad news isn't wine. It doesn't improve with age.

2166.author: Colin Powell
2166.quote: If a leader doesn't convey passion and intensity then there will be no passion and intensity within the organization and they'll start to fall down and get depressed.

2167.author: Colin Powell
2167.quote: No battle plan survives contact with the enemy.

2168.author: Colin Powell
2168.quote: Have fun in your command. Don't always run at a breakneck pace. Take leave when you've earned it, spend time with your families.

2169.author: Colin Powell
2169.quote: In other words, don't expect to always be great. Disappointments, failures and setbacks are a normal part of the lifecycle of a unit or a company and what the leader has to do is constantly be up and say 'we have a problem, let's go and get it'.

2170.author: Colin Powell
2170.quote: As I have done in every election since I started voting so many years ago, I always like to take my time and examine the two candidates, see not only the two candidates but the policies they will bring in, the people they will bring in, who they might appoint to the Supreme Court, and look at the whole range of issues before making a decision.

2171.author: Colin Powell
2171.quote: Avoid having your ego so close to your position that when your position falls, your ego goes with it.

2172.author: Colin Powell
2172.quote: Never neglect details. When everyone's mind is dulled or distracted the leader must be doubly vigilant.

2173.author: Confucius
2173.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.

2174.author: Confucius
2174.quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.

2175.author: Confucius
2175.quote: The will to win, the desire to succeed, the urge to reach your full potential... these are the keys that will unlock the door to personal excellence.

2176.author: Confucius
2176.quote: Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it.

2177.author: Confucius
2177.quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.

2178.author: Confucius
2178.quote: Silence is a true friend who never betrays.

2179.author: Confucius
2179.quote: Wisdom, compassion, and courage are the three universally recognized moral qualities of men.

2180.author: Confucius
2180.quote: Wherever you go, go with all your heart.

2181.author: Confucius
2181.quote: The more man meditates upon good thoughts, the better will be his world and the world at large.

2182.author: Confucius
2182.quote: You cannot open a book without learning something.

2183.author: Confucius
2183.quote: It is easy to hate and it is difficult to love. This is how the whole scheme of things works. All good things are difficult to achieve; and bad things are very easy to get.

2184.author: Confucius
2184.quote: Real knowledge is to know the extent of one's ignorance.

2185.author: Confucius
2185.quote: When it is obvious that the goals cannot be reached, don't adjust the goals, adjust the action steps.

2186.author: Confucius
2186.quote: By three methods we may learn wisdom: First, by reflection, which is noblest; Second, by imitation, which is easiest; and third by experience, which is the bitterest.

2187.author: Confucius
2187.quote: I hear and I forget. I see and I remember. I do and I understand.

2188.author: Confucius
2188.quote: When anger rises, think of the consequences.

2189.author: Confucius
2189.quote: The strength of a nation derives from the integrity of the home.

2190.author: Confucius
2190.quote: To practice five things under all circumstances constitutes perfect virtue; these five are gravity, generosity of soul, sincerity, earnestness, and kindness.

2191.author: Confucius
2191.quote: It is more shameful to distrust our friends than to be deceived by them.

2192.author: Confucius
2192.quote: Humility is the solid foundation of all virtues.

2193.author: Confucius
2193.quote: The expectations of life depend upon diligence; the mechanic that would perfect his work must first sharpen his tools.

2194.author: Confucius
2194.quote: Better a diamond with a flaw than a pebble without.

2195.author: Confucius
2195.quote: To know what you know and what you do not know, that is true knowledge.

2196.author: Confucius
2196.quote: He who learns but does not think, is lost! He who thinks but does not learn is in great danger.

2197.author: Confucius
2197.quote: What you do not want done to yourself, do not do to others.

2198.author: Confucius
2198.quote: The superior man is modest in his speech, but exceeds in his actions.

2199.author: Conor McGregor
2199.quote: You might win some, you might lose some. But you go in, you challenge yourself, you become a better man, a better individual, a better fighter.

2200.author: Conor McGregor
2200.quote: I enjoy competition. I enjoy challenges. If a challenge is in front of me and it appeals to me, I will go ahead and conquer it.

2201.author: Conor McGregor
2201.quote: I'm just looking to learn, grow, stay focused, and become a better fighter and a better athlete.

2202.author: Conor McGregor
2202.quote: The thing about the truth is, not a lot of people can handle it.

2203.author: Conor McGregor
2203.quote: The more you seek the uncomfortable, the more you will become comfortable.

2204.author: Conor McGregor
2204.quote: Life is about growing and improving and getting better.

2205.author: Conor McGregor
2205.quote: I'm not going to get somewhere and say, 'OK, I'm done.' Success is never final; I'll just keep on going. The same way as failure never being fatal. Just keep going. I'm going to the stars and then past them.

2206.author: Conor McGregor
2206.quote: I take inspiration from everyone and everything. I'm inspired by current champions, former champions, true competitors, people dedicated to their dream, hard workers, dreamers, believers, achievers.

2207.author: Conor McGregor
2207.quote: I wish everyone well, but you need to focus on yourself. You need to stop putting your hand out. Everyone wants hand outs. Everyone wants things for free. You've got to put in the work. You've got to grind. You've got go through the struggle, and you've got to get it.

2208.author: Conor McGregor
2208.quote: My success isn't a result of arrogance - it's a result of belief.

2209.author: Conor McGregor
2209.quote: I guess I have a little bit of an ego. I'm confidently cocky, you might say.

2210.author: Conor McGregor
2210.quote: To do anything to a high level, it has to be total obsession.

2212.author: Conor McGregor
2212.quote: When I am free to train and free to move, I feel like a gorilla in the jungle. Then, when there are a bunch of media obligations, I feel like I have been captured and am being kept on display.

2213.author: Conor McGregor
2213.quote: My unpredictability is what separates me. If you move in so many ways, your opponent is not focused on what he's doing. He's focusing in on what you're doing, and it freezes him. When they freeze and you hit, they shatter like glass.

2214.author: Conor McGregor
2214.quote: I don't feel pressure in a negative way. I like pressure. I feel excitement and calm at the same time. No pressure, no diamonds. I want pressure: pressure creates drama, creates emotion.

2215.author: Conor McGregor
2215.quote: My preparation is about precision. It is a science.

2216.author: Conor McGregor
2216.quote: I believe in believing. My coach John Kavanagh is a big atheist, and he is always trying to persuade people to his way of thinking, and I think, 'What a waste of energy.' If people want to believe in this god or that god, that's fine by me; believe away. But I think we can be our own gods. I believe in myself.

2217.author: Conor McGregor
2217.quote: Trash talk? Smack talk? This is an American term that makes me laugh. I simply speak the truth. I'm an Irish man.

2218.author: Conor McGregor
2218.quote: If you deserve it, go get it.

2219.author: Conor McGregor
2219.quote: When I say something's going to happen, it's going to happen.

2220.author: Conor McGregor
2220.quote: Any top-level athlete, it's always the same. There's always that hint of arrogance there... It's hard to be humble when you're the best.

2221.author: Conor McGregor
2221.quote: There's many ups and downs in the fight game.

2222.author: Conor McGregor
2222.quote: I see fighters make funny videos about me and stick them on Facebook and get 20 likes. When I make a video, I sell it to Fox and make seven figures. That's the difference.

2223.author: Conor McGregor
2223.quote: People are so caught in a routine, doing the same things over and over.

2224.author: Conor McGregor
2224.quote: I'll die a crazy old man!

2225.author: D. H. Lawrence
2225.quote: Ethics and equity and the principles of justice do not change with the calendar.

2226.author: D. H. Lawrence
2226.quote: Life is a travelling to the edge of knowledge, then a leap taken.

2227.author: D. H. Lawrence
2227.quote: The fairest thing in nature, a flower, still has its roots in earth and manure.

2228.author: D. H. Lawrence
2228.quote: Love is the flower of life, and blossoms unexpectedly and without law, and must be plucked where it is found, and enjoyed for the brief hour of its duration.

2229.author: D. H. Lawrence
2229.quote: I never saw a wild thing sorry for itself. A small bird will drop frozen dead from a bough without ever having felt sorry for itself.

2230.author: D. H. Lawrence
2230.quote: For man, as for flower and beast and bird, the supreme triumph is to be most vividly, most perfectly alive.

2231.author: D. H. Lawrence
2231.quote: Tragedy is like strong acid - it dissolves away all but the very gold of truth.

2232.author: D. H. Lawrence
2232.quote: Be still when you have nothing to say; when genuine passion moves you, say what you've got to say, and say it hot.

2233.author: D. H. Lawrence
2233.quote: I want to live my life so that my nights are not full of regrets.

2234.author: D. H. Lawrence
2234.quote: The only justice is to follow the sincere intuition of the soul, angry or gentle. Anger is just, and pity is just, but judgement is never just.

2235.author: D. H. Lawrence
2235.quote: The business of art is to reveal the relation between man and his environment.

2236.author: D. H. Lawrence
2236.quote: Sex and beauty are inseparable, like life and consciousness. And the intelligence which goes with sex and beauty, and arises out of sex and beauty, is intuition.

2237.author: D. H. Lawrence
2237.quote: But better die than live mechanically a life that is a repetition of repetitions.

2238.author: D. H. Lawrence
2238.quote: When one jumps over the edge, one is bound to land somewhere.

2239.author: D. H. Lawrence
2239.quote: My great religion is a belief in the blood, the flesh, as being wiser than the intellect. We can go wrong in our minds. But what our blood feels and believes and says, is always true. The intellect is only a bit and a bridle.

2240.author: D. H. Lawrence
2240.quote: Life is ours to be spent, not to be saved.

2241.author: D. H. Lawrence
2241.quote: Reason is a supple nymph, and slippery as a fish by nature. She had as leave give her kiss to an absurdity any day, as to syllogistic truth. The absurdity may turn out truer.

2242.author: D. H. Lawrence
2242.quote: One must learn to love, and go through a good deal of suffering to get to it... and the journey is always towards the other soul.

2243.author: D. H. Lawrence
2243.quote: The more I see of democracy the more I dislike it. It just brings everything down to the mere vulgar level of wages and prices, electric light and water closets, and nothing else.

2244.author: D. H. Lawrence
2244.quote: Money is our madness, our vast collective madness.

2245.author: D. H. Lawrence
2245.quote: Men and women should stay apart, till their hearts grow gentle towards one another again.

2246.author: D. H. Lawrence
2246.quote: I can't do with mountains at close quarters - they are always in the way, and they are so stupid, never moving and never doing anything but obtrude themselves.

2247.author: D. H. Lawrence
2247.quote: It is quite true, as some poets said, that the God who created man must have had a sinister sense of humor, creating him a reasonable being, yet forcing him to take this ridiculous posture, and driving him with blind craving for this ridiculous performance.

2248.author: D. H. Lawrence
2248.quote: In every living thing there is the desire for love.

2249.author: D. H. Lawrence
2249.quote: The world of men is dreaming, it has gone mad in its sleep, and a snake is strangling it, but it can't wake up.

2250.author: D. H. Lawrence
2250.quote: There is only one thing that a man really wants to do, all his life; and that is, to find his way to his God, his Morning Star, salute his fellow man, and enjoy the woman who has come the long way with him.

2251.author: Dalai Lama
2251.quote: Calm mind brings inner strength and self-confidence, so that's very important for good health.

2252.author: Dalai Lama
2252.quote: When you practice gratefulness, there is a sense of respect toward others.

2253.author: Dalai Lama
2253.quote: Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible.

2254.author: Dalai Lama
2254.quote: If you want others to be happy, practice compassion. If you want to be happy, practice compassion.

2255.author: Dalai Lama
2255.quote: Love and compassion are necessities, not luxuries. Without them humanity cannot survive.

2256.author: Dalai Lama
2256.quote: In order to carry a positive action we must develop here a positive vision.

2257.author: Dalai Lama
2257.quote: My religion is very simple. My religion is kindness.

2258.author: Dalai Lama
2258.quote: Old friends pass away, new friends appear. It is just like the days. An old day passes, a new day arrives. The important thing is to make it meaningful: a meaningful friend - or a meaningful day.

2259.author: Dalai Lama
2259.quote: This is my simple religion. There is no need for temples; no need for complicated philosophy. Our own brain, our own heart is our temple; the philosophy is kindness.

2260.author: Dalai Lama
2260.quote: A lack of transparency results in distrust and a deep sense of insecurity.

2262.author: Dalai Lama
2262.quote: The roots of all goodness lie in the soil of appreciation for goodness.

2263.author: Dalai Lama
2263.quote: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.

2264.author: Dalai Lama
2264.quote: In the practice of tolerance, one's enemy is the best teacher.

2265.author: Dalai Lama
2265.quote: When we meet real tragedy in life, we can react in two ways - either by losing hope and falling into self-destructive habits, or by using the challenge to find our inner strength. Thanks to the teachings of Buddha, I have been able to take this second way.

2266.author: Dalai Lama
2266.quote: I find hope in the darkest of days, and focus in the brightest. I do not judge the universe.

2267.author: Dalai Lama
2267.quote: If you can, help others; if you cannot do that, at least do not harm them.

2268.author: Dalai Lama
2268.quote: We can live without religion and meditation, but we cannot survive without human affection.

2269.author: Dalai Lama
2269.quote: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.

2270.author: Dalai Lama
2270.quote: It is very important to generate a good attitude, a good heart, as much as possible. From this, happiness in both the short term and the long term for both yourself and others will come.

2271.author: Dalai Lama
2271.quote: Even an animal, if you show genuine affection, gradually trust develops... If you always showing bad face and beating, how can you develop friendship?

2272.author: Dalai Lama
2272.quote: Too much self-centered attitude, you see, brings, you see, isolation. Result: loneliness, fear, anger. The extreme self-centered attitude is the source of suffering.

2273.author: Dalai Lama
2273.quote: Our prime purpose in this life is to help others. And if you can't help them, at least don't hurt them.

2274.author: Dalai Lama
2274.quote: All religions try to benefit people, with the same basic message of the need for love and compassion, for justice and honesty, for contentment.

2275.author: Dalai Lama
2275.quote: We can never obtain peace in the outer world until we make peace with ourselves.

2276.author: Dalai Lama
2276.quote: When you are discontent, you always want more, more, more. Your desire can never be satisfied. But when you practice contentment, you can say to yourself, 'Oh yes - I already have everything that I really need.'

2277.author: Dale Carnegie
2277.quote: If you want to conquer fear, don't sit home and think about it. Go out and get busy.

2278.author: Dale Carnegie
2278.quote: Happiness doesn't depend on any external conditions, it is governed by our mental attitude.

2279.author: Dale Carnegie
2279.quote: People rarely succeed unless they have fun in what they are doing.

2280.author: Dale Carnegie
2280.quote: One of the most tragic things I know about human nature is that all of us tend to put off living. We are all dreaming of some magical rose garden over the horizon instead of enjoying the roses that are blooming outside our windows today.

2281.author: Dale Carnegie
2281.quote: When dealing with people, remember you are not dealing with creatures of logic, but creatures of emotion.

2282.author: Dale Carnegie
2282.quote: Our fatigue is often caused not by work, but by worry, frustration and resentment.

2283.author: Dale Carnegie
2283.quote: The successful man will profit from his mistakes and try again in a different way.

2284.author: Dale Carnegie
2284.quote: Inaction breeds doubt and fear. Action breeds confidence and courage. If you want to conquer fear, do not sit home and think about it. Go out and get busy.

2285.author: Dale Carnegie
2285.quote: Fear doesn't exist anywhere except in the mind.

2286.author: Dale Carnegie
2286.quote: The only way to get the best of an argument is to avoid it.

2287.author: Dale Carnegie
2287.quote: Most of the important things in the world have been accomplished by people who have kept on trying when there seemed to be no hope at all.

2288.author: Dale Carnegie
2288.quote: Today is life-the only life you are sure of. Make the most of today. Get interested in something. Shake yourself awake. Develop a hobby. Let the winds of enthusiasm sweep through you. Live today with gusto.

2289.author: Dale Carnegie
2289.quote: Take a chance! All life is a chance. The man who goes farthest is generally the one who is willing to do and dare.

2290.author: Dale Carnegie
2290.quote: Remember happiness doesn't depend upon who you are or what you have; it depends solely on what you think.

2291.author: Dale Carnegie
2291.quote: When fate hands you a lemon, make lemonade.

2292.author: Dale Carnegie
2292.quote: If you want to gather honey, don't kick over the beehive.

2293.author: Dale Carnegie
2293.quote: Don't be afraid to give your best to what seemingly are small jobs. Every time you conquer one it makes you that much stronger. If you do the little jobs well, the big ones will tend to take care of themselves.

2294.author: Dale Carnegie
2294.quote: Success is getting what you want. Happiness is wanting what you get.

2295.author: Dale Carnegie
2295.quote: Develop success from failures. Discouragement and failure are two of the surest stepping stones to success.

2296.author: Dale Carnegie
2296.quote: The royal road to a man's heart is to talk to him about the things he treasures most.

2297.author: Dale Carnegie
2297.quote: There are four ways, and only four ways, in which we have contact with the world. We are evaluated and classified by these four contacts: what we do, how we look, what we say, and how we say it.

2298.author: Dale Carnegie
2298.quote: You can make more friends in two months by becoming interested in other people than you can in two years by trying to get other people interested in you.

2299.author: Dale Carnegie
2299.quote: You can conquer almost any fear if you will only make up your mind to do so. For remember, fear doesn't exist anywhere except in the mind.

2300.author: Dale Carnegie
2300.quote: If you believe in what you are doing, then let nothing hold you up in your work. Much of the best work of the world has been done against seeming impossibilities. The thing is to get the work done.

2301.author: Dale Carnegie
2301.quote: You never achieve success unless you like what you are doing.

2302.author: Dale Carnegie
2302.quote: Act enthusiastic and you will be enthusiastic.

2303.author: Dan Quayle
2303.quote: It isn't pollution that's harming the environment. It's the impurities in our air and water that are doing it.

2304.author: Dan Quayle
2304.quote: What a waste it is to lose one's mind. Or not to have a mind is being very wasteful. How true that is.

2305.author: Dan Quayle
2305.quote: It's time for the human race to enter the solar system.

2306.author: Dan Quayle
2306.quote: The future will be better tomorrow.

2307.author: Dan Quayle
2307.quote: We will move forward, we will move upward, and yes, we will move onward.

2308.author: Dan Quayle
2308.quote: I love California, I practically grew up in Phoenix.

2309.author: Dan Quayle
2309.quote: If we don't succeed we run the risk of failure.

2310.author: Dan Quayle
2310.quote: One word sums up probably the responsibility of any vice-president, and that one word is 'to be prepared'.

2311.author: Dan Quayle
2311.quote: The other day the President said, I know you've had some rough times, and I want to do something that will show the nation what faith that I have in you, in your maturity and sense of responsibility. He paused, then said, would you like a puppy?

2312.author: Dan Quayle
2312.quote: Japan is an important ally of ours. Japan and the United States of the Western industrialized capacity, 60 percent of the GNP, two countries. That's a statement in and of itself.

2313.author: Dan Quayle
2313.quote: My friends, no matter how rough the road may be, we can and we will, never, never surrender to what is right.

2314.author: Dan Quayle
2314.quote: It's a very good historical book about history.

2315.author: Dan Quayle
2315.quote: Republicans have been accused of abandoning the poor. It's the other way around. They never vote for us.

2316.author: Dan Quayle
2316.quote: The global importance of the Middle East is that it keeps the Far East and the Near East from encroaching on each other.

2317.author: Dan Quayle
2317.quote: The Holocaust was an obscene period in our nation's history. I mean in this century's history. But we all lived in this century. I didn't live in this century.

2318.author: Dan Quayle
2318.quote: I couldn't help but be impressed by the magnitude of the earthquake.

2319.author: Dan Quayle
2319.quote: We have a firm commitment to NATO, we are a part of NATO. We have a firm commitment to Europe. We are a part of Europe.

2320.author: Dan Quayle
2320.quote: A low voter turnout is an indication of fewer people going to the polls.

2321.author: Dan Quayle
2321.quote: Verbosity leads to unclear, inarticulate things.

2322.author: Dan Quayle
2322.quote: Tobacco exports should be expanded aggressively because Americans are smoking less.

2323.author: Dan Quayle
2323.quote: I believe we are on an irreversible trend toward more freedom and democracy - but that could change.

2324.author: Dan Quayle
2324.quote: Bank failures are caused by depositors who don't deposit enough money to cover losses due to mismanagement.

2325.author: Dan Quayle
2325.quote: Votes are like trees, if you are trying to build a forest. If you have more trees than you have forests, then at that point the pollsters will probably say you will win.

2326.author: Dan Quayle
2326.quote: I have made good judgments in the past. I have made good judgments in the future.

2327.author: Dan Quayle
2327.quote: Welcome to President Bush, Mrs. Bush, and my fellow astronauts.

2328.author: Dan Quayle
2328.quote: Bobby Knight told me this: 'There is nothing that a good defense cannot beat a better offense.' In other words a good offense wins.

2329.author: Danny DeVito
2329.quote: I don't look ahead. I'm right here with you. It's a good way to be.

2330.author: Danny DeVito
2330.quote: I've been to the Leaning Tower of Pisa. It's a tower, and it's leaning. You look at it, but nothing happens, so then you look for someplace to get a sandwich.

2331.author: Danny DeVito
2331.quote: It's fun to be on the edge. I think you do your best work when you take chances, when you're not safe, when you're not in the middle of the road, at least for me, anyway.

2332.author: Danny DeVito
2332.quote: People come into your lives who you have a good time with, and time goes by and you still have a good time with them and you do stupid stuff with them. To me, that's life.

2333.author: Danny DeVito
2333.quote: I'm always studying and I've been doing it for a long time now.

2334.author: Danny DeVito
2334.quote: There are two dilemmas that rattle the human skull: How do you hang on to someone who won't stay? And how do you get rid of someone who won't go?

2335.author: Danny DeVito
2335.quote: It's just an ice bucket with a bottle in it. The two flute glasses are little tray. I got to shut the curtains. I'm in my boxer shorts and shirt. I'm going to take a bath and go to bed. But I want to shut the blinds so it's really dark in the room.

2336.author: Danny DeVito
2336.quote: I didn't do it because of the underlying greed that's prevailing, but it is about greed, doing the right thing at the right time using your clout when you have it and what for and what reason.

2337.author: Danny DeVito
2337.quote: It's a first for me. It's my first nude scene.

2338.author: Danny DeVito
2338.quote: I'll tell you one thing, it's a cruel, cruel world.

2339.author: Danny DeVito
2339.quote: I love women. I mean, I'm married, but I used to get in all kinds of trouble.

2340.author: Danny DeVito
2340.quote: I'll watch Ricky Gervais in anything he does. The guy's hilarious.

2341.author: Danny DeVito
2341.quote: I have been very fortunate in my life. I have had a lot of happiness. I have a great family and I work a lot, and that's what I like to do.

2342.author: Danny DeVito
2342.quote: I am self-centred. I just adore myself.

2343.author: Danny DeVito
2343.quote: You have to give people permission to laugh. That's why they would always cut to the banana peel in the Laurel and Hardy movies.

2344.author: Danny DeVito
2344.quote: After you've lived with somebody for 11 years, what's a guy in a robe reading from a book going to change?

2345.author: Danny DeVito
2345.quote: This big part flies off on the floor. The other part goes like this and lands in my foot! Standing up! It's standing in my foot! Right in the side of my foot. The flute glass. I think I'm like in one of my own pictures.

2346.author: Danny DeVito
2346.quote: Of course I've got lawyers. They are like nuclear weapons, I've got em 'cause everyone else has. But as soon as you use them they screw everything up.

2347.author: Danny DeVito
2347.quote: What Tim does is, he calls me and sends me the script. And then he sends me a drawing, an illustration of his image of me as the character. It's so great.

2348.author: Danny DeVito
2348.quote: Wherever I am, it's a really good feeling to have that connection to people. I love to go out to talk to people and be with folks. I don't shy away from it.

2349.author: Danny DeVito
2349.quote: So we see Edward as a young man on the road and he meets a giant and he brings the giant to a circus where he meets a Miss Calloway. He sees the woman of his dreams and I am the only one who knows who she is.

2350.author: Danny DeVito
2350.quote: I developed that for a long time. I also developed 'Sugar Sweet Science' at New Line and that didn't happen. That was a boxing movie. And between all that there were a couple of other things.

2351.author: Danny DeVito
2351.quote: Jersey is always with me. I was one of the lucky ones. Asbury Park is just the greatest place in the world to spend your childhood.

2352.author: Danny DeVito
2352.quote: If you're going to have kids, there's only one way to go. They have to know they're the most important things in your life, and once you're doing that, there's no way that you could not learn from them, because they just give you stuff constantly.

2353.author: Danny DeVito
2353.quote: I don't know. I think it's funny! I think it's funny! I go, what? It's so absurd. I'm alone.

2354.author: Danny DeVito
2354.quote: In this movie, you have all the things you love from Tim. All the magic and the whimsy and the surreal, but he also has a fantastic story of a father and son that really gets under your skin.

2355.author: David Bowie
2355.quote: I don't know where I'm going from here, but I promise it won't be boring.

2356.author: David Bowie
2356.quote: I'm an instant star. Just add water and stir.

2357.author: David Bowie
2357.quote: Tomorrow belongs to those who can hear it coming.

2358.author: David Bowie
2358.quote: I'm not a prophet or a stone aged man, just a mortal with potential of a superman. I'm living on.

2359.author: David Bowie
2359.quote: What I have is a malevolent curiosity. That's what drives my need to write and what probably leads me to look at things a little askew. I do tend to take a different perspective from most people.

2360.author: David Bowie
2360.quote: I find only freedom in the realms of eccentricity.

2361.author: David Bowie
2361.quote: The truth is of course is that there is no journey. We are arriving and departing all at the same time.

2362.author: David Bowie
2362.quote: Confront a corpse at least once. The absolute absence of life is the most disturbing and challenging confrontation you will ever have.

2363.author: David Bowie
2363.quote: I always had a repulsive need to be something more than human.

2364.author: David Bowie
2364.quote: I feel confident imposing change on myself. It's a lot more fun progressing than looking back. That's why I need to throw curve balls.

2365.author: David Bowie
2365.quote: Glam really did plant seeds for a new identity. I think a lot of kids needed that - that sense of reinvention. Kids learned that however crazy you may think it is, there is a place for what you want to do and who you want to be.

2366.author: David Bowie
2366.quote: What I like to do is try to make a difference with the work I do.

2367.author: David Bowie
2367.quote: On the other hand, what I like my music to do to me is awaken the ghosts inside of me. Not the demons, you understand, but the ghosts.

2368.author: David Bowie
2368.quote: When I'm stuck for a closing to a lyric, I will drag out my last resort: overwhelming illogic.

2369.author: David Bowie
2369.quote: All art really does is keep you focused on questions of humanity, and it really is about how do we get on with our maker.

2370.author: David Bowie
2370.quote: Everything I read about hitting a midlife crisis was true. I had such a struggle letting go of youthful things and learning how to exist and have enthusiasm while settling into the comfort of an older age.

2371.author: David Bowie
2371.quote: A song has to take on character, shape, body and influence people to an extent that they use it for their own devices. It must affect them not just as a song, but as a lifestyle.

2372.author: David Bowie
2372.quote: I've never responded well to entrenched negative thinking.

2373.author: David Bowie
2373.quote: I think Mick Jagger would be astounded and amazed if he realized that to many people he is not a sex symbol, but a mother image.

2374.author: David Bowie
2374.quote: Anxiety and spiritual searching have been consistent themes with me, and that figures into my worldview. But I tend to make my songs sound like relationship songs.

2375.author: David Bowie
2375.quote: It's amazing: I am a New Yorker. It's strange; I never thought I would be.

2376.author: David Bowie
2376.quote: I went through all the musicians in my life who I admire as bright, intelligent, virtuosic players.

2377.author: David Bowie
2377.quote: It amazes me sometimes that even intelligent people will analyze a situation or make a judgement after only recognizing the standard or traditional structure of a piece.

2378.author: David Bowie
2378.quote: Fame itself... doesn't really afford you anything more than a good seat in a restaurant.

2379.author: David Bowie
2379.quote: As you get older, the questions come down to about two or three. How long? And what do I do with the time I've got left?

2380.author: David Bowie
2380.quote: I'm not one of those guys that has a great worldview. I kind of deal with terror and fear and isolation and abandonment.

2381.author: Deepak Chopra
2381.quote: In the midst of movement and chaos, keep stillness inside of you.

2382.author: Deepak Chopra
2382.quote: Enlightened leadership is spiritual if we understand spirituality not as some kind of religious dogma or ideology but as the domain of awareness where we experience values like truth, goodness, beauty, love and compassion, and also intuition, creativity, insight and focused attention.

2383.author: Deepak Chopra
2383.quote: The highest levels of performance come to people who are centered, intuitive, creative, and reflective - people who know to see a problem as an opportunity.

2384.author: Deepak Chopra
2384.quote: There are no extra pieces in the universe. Everyone is here because he or she has a place to fill, and every piece must fit itself into the big jigsaw puzzle.

2385.author: Deepak Chopra
2385.quote: Our minds influence the key activity of the brain, which then influences everything; perception, cognition, thoughts and feelings, personal relationships; they're all a projection of you.

2386.author: Deepak Chopra
2386.quote: There is no fixed physical reality, no single perception of the world, just numerous ways of interpreting world views as dictated by one's nervous system and the specific environment of our planetary existence.

2387.author: Deepak Chopra
2387.quote: But the real secret to lifelong good health is actually the opposite: Let your body take care of you.

2388.author: Deepak Chopra
2388.quote: Always go with your passions. Never ask yourself if it's realistic or not.

2389.author: Deepak Chopra
2389.quote: If you want to do really important things in life and big things in life, you can't do anything by yourself. And your best teams are your friends and your siblings.

2390.author: Deepak Chopra
2390.quote: Karma is experience, and experience creates memory, and memory creates imagination and desire, and desire creates karma again. If I buy a cup of coffee, that's karma. I now have that memory that might give me the potential desire for having cappuccino, and I walk into Starbucks, and there's karma all over again.

2391.author: Deepak Chopra
2391.quote: In every conversation I've had - with housewives in Mumbai, with middle-class people, upper-class, in the slums - everyone says there is an underlying consciousness of karma. That people believe in karma - that what you're putting out is going to come back. If I do something to you, the energy of it is going to come back to me in the future.

2392.author: Deepak Chopra
2392.quote: We all feel the urge to condemn ourselves out of guilt, to blame others for our misfortunes and to fantasize about total disaster.

2393.author: Deepak Chopra
2393.quote: Meditation makes the entire nervous system go into a field of coherence.

2394.author: Deepak Chopra
2394.quote: Ultimately spiritual awareness unfolds when you're flexible, when you're spontaneous, when you're detached, when you're easy on yourself and easy on others.

2395.author: Deepak Chopra
2395.quote: Although we take it for granted, sanitation is a physical measure that has probably done more to increase human life span than any kind of drug or surgery.

2396.author: Deepak Chopra
2396.quote: You can't make positive choices for the rest of your life without an environment that makes those choices easy, natural, and enjoyable.

2397.author: Deepak Chopra
2397.quote: We are not victims of aging, sickness and death. These are part of scenery, not the seer, who is immune to any form of change. This seer is the spirit, the expression of eternal being.

2398.author: Deepak Chopra
2398.quote: The real key is to live in an environment where the mind feels free to choose the right thing instead of being compelled by habit and inertia to choose the wrong thing.

2399.author: Deepak Chopra
2399.quote: Nothing is more important than reconnecting with your bliss. Nothing is as rich. Nothing is more real.

2400.author: Deepak Chopra
2400.quote: New Age values are conscious evolution, a non-sectarian society, a non-military culture, global sharing, healing the environment, sustainable economies, self-determination, social justice, economic empowerment of the poor, love, compassion in action, going beyond religious fundamentalism, going beyond nationalism-extreme nationalism, culture.

2401.author: Deepak Chopra
2401.quote: I think we need the feminine qualities of leadership, which include attention to aesthetics and the environment, nurturing, affection, intuition and the qualities that make people feel safe and cared for.

2402.author: Deepak Chopra
2402.quote: Globalism began as a vision of a world with free trade, shared prosperity, and open borders. These are good, even noble things to aim for.

2403.author: Deepak Chopra
2403.quote: We can actually accelerate the process through meditation, through the ability to find stillness through loving actions, through compassion and sharing, through understanding the nature of the creative process in the universe and having a sense of connection to it. So, that's conscious evolution.

2404.author: Deepak Chopra
2404.quote: Success comes when people act together; failure tends to happen alone.

2405.author: Deepak Chopra
2405.quote: No solution can ever be found by running in three different directions.

2406.author: Deepak Chopra
2406.quote: Research has shown that the best way to be happy is to make each day happy.

2407.author: Demetri Martin
2407.quote: I love women, but I feel like you can't trust some of them. Some of them are liars, you know? Like I was in the park and I met this girl, she was cute and she had a dog. And I went up to her, we started talking. She told me her dog's name. Then I said, 'Does he bite?' She said, 'No.' And I said, 'Oh yeah? Then how does he eat?' Liar.

2408.author: Demetri Martin
2408.quote: The digital camera is a great invention because it allows us to reminisce. Instantly.

2409.author: Demetri Martin
2409.quote: My favorite fruit is grapes. Because with grapes, you always get another chance. 'Cause, you know, if you have a crappy apple or a peach, you're stuck with that crappy piece of fruit. But if you have a crappy grape, no problem - just move on to the next. 'Grapes: The Fruit of Hope.'

2410.author: Demetri Martin
2410.quote: When you have a fat friend there are no see-saws, only catapults.

2411.author: Demetri Martin
2411.quote: Employee of the month is a good example of how somebody can be both a winner and a loser at the same time.

2412.author: Demetri Martin
2412.quote: I used to play sports. Then I realized you can buy trophies. Now I am good at everything.

2413.author: Demetri Martin
2413.quote: Swimming is a confusing sport, because sometimes you do it for fun, and other times you do it to not die. And when I'm swimming, sometimes I'm not sure which one it is.

2414.author: Demetri Martin
2414.quote: I like video games, but they are very violent. I want to create a video game in which you have to help all the characters who have died in the other games. 'Hey, man, what are you playing?' 'Super Busy Hospital. Could you leave me alone? I'm performing surgery! This guy got shot in the head, like, 27 times!'

2415.author: Demetri Martin
2415.quote: The worst time to have a heart attack is during a game of charades.

2416.author: Demetri Martin
2416.quote: I like to use 'I Can't Believe it's Not Butter' on my toast in the morning, because sometimes when I eat breakfast, I like to be incredulous. How was breakfast? Unbelievable.

2417.author: Demetri Martin
2417.quote: I think that when you get dressed in the morning, sometimes you're really making a decision about your behavior for the day. Like if you put on flipflops, you're saying: 'Hope I don't get chased today.' 'Be nice to people in sneakers.'

2418.author: Demetri Martin
2418.quote: I was walking in the park and this guy waved at me. Then he said, 'I'm sorry, I thought you were someone else.' I said, 'I am.'

2419.author: Demetri Martin
2419.quote: I noticed that there are no B batteries. I think that's to avoid confusion, cause if there were you wouldn't know if someone was stuttering. 'Yes, hello I'd like some b-batteries.' 'What kind?' 'B-batteries.' 'What kind?' 'B-batteries!' and D-batteries that's hard for foreigners. 'Yes, I would like de batteries.'

2420.author: Demetri Martin
2420.quote: I love catching a snapshot of something that is just about to happen. Or maybe something that just happened, you know. But I like especially that just-before kind of feeling.

2421.author: Demetri Martin
2421.quote: Stand up is really fun because if I think of a joke or a funny idea, then I can just go and tell some people and if they laugh, they laugh right away.

2422.author: Demetri Martin
2422.quote: Saying, 'I'm sorry' is the same as saying, ' I apologize.' Except at a funeral.

2423.author: Demetri Martin
2423.quote: I like women, but you can't always trust them. Some of them are big liars, like this one woman I met who had a dog. I asked her her dog's name and then I asked, 'Does he bite?' and she said, 'No.' And I said, 'So how does he eat?' Liar!

2424.author: Demetri Martin
2424.quote: Whenever I'm on my computer, I don't type 'lol'. I type 'lqtm' - laugh quietly to myself. It's more honest.

2425.author: Demetri Martin
2425.quote: The shortest feedback loop I can think of is doing improvisation in front of an audience.

2426.author: Demetri Martin
2426.quote: If I ever saw an amputee getting hanged, I'd probably just start calling out letters.

2427.author: Demetri Martin
2427.quote: It's funny: when people always talk about the importance of role models, I used to think that was so exaggerated, but as I get older, I start to realize I don't feel that way so much anymore. If you see somebody like you who's doing something, an older version of what you are, it does make you feel like it's more possible.

2428.author: Demetri Martin
2428.quote: I wrapped my Christmas presents early this year, but I used the wrong paper. See, the paper I used said 'Happy Birthday' on it. I didn't want to waste it so I just wrote 'Jesus' on it.

2429.author: Demetri Martin
2429.quote: They say that structure is freedom, and in a sense it is. When you're dealing with multiple constraints, you have to figure out what you can get out of that.

2430.author: Demetri Martin
2430.quote: I went to law school. I found it interesting for the first three weeks.

2431.author: Demetri Martin
2431.quote: I think it would be cool if you were writing a ransom note on your computer, if the paper clip popped up and said, 'Looks like you're writing a ransom note. Need help? You should use more forceful language, you'll get more money.'

2432.author: Demetri Martin
2432.quote: I think it's interesting that 'cologne' rhymes with 'alone.'

2433.author: Denis Waitley
2433.quote: Happiness cannot be traveled to, owned, earned, worn or consumed. Happiness is the spiritual experience of living every minute with love, grace, and gratitude.

2434.author: Denis Waitley
2434.quote: A smile is the light in your window that tells others that there is a caring, sharing person inside.

2435.author: Denis Waitley
2435.quote: The greatest gifts you can give your children are the roots of responsibility and the wings of independence.

2436.author: Denis Waitley
2436.quote: Success is almost totally dependent upon drive and persistence. The extra energy required to make another effort or try another approach is the secret of winning.

2437.author: Denis Waitley
2437.quote: Don't dwell on what went wrong. Instead, focus on what to do next. Spend your energies on moving forward toward finding the answer.

2438.author: Denis Waitley
2438.quote: Learn from the past, set vivid, detailed goals for the future, and live in the only moment of time over which you have any control: now.

2439.author: Denis Waitley
2439.quote: A dream is your creative vision for your life in the future. You must break out of your current comfort zone and become comfortable with the unfamiliar and the unknown.

2440.author: Denis Waitley
2440.quote: Time and health are two precious assets that we don't recognize and appreciate until they have been depleted.

2441.author: Denis Waitley
2441.quote: As long as we are persistence in our pursuit of our deepest destiny, we will continue to grow. We cannot choose the day or time when we will fully bloom. It happens in its own time.

2442.author: Denis Waitley
2442.quote: Determination gives you the resolve to keep going in spite of the roadblocks that lay before you.

2443.author: Denis Waitley
2443.quote: The results you achieve will be in direct proportion to the effort you apply.

2444.author: Denis Waitley
2444.quote: You must look within for value, but must look beyond for perspective.

2445.author: Denis Waitley
2445.quote: The winner's edge is not in a gifted birth, a high IQ, or in talent. The winner's edge is all in the attitude, not aptitude. Attitude is the criterion for success.

2446.author: Denis Waitley
2446.quote: It is not in the pursuit of happiness that we find fulfillment, it is in the happiness of pursuit.

2447.author: Denis Waitley
2447.quote: The most splendid achievement of all is the constant striving to surpass yourself and to be worthy of your own approval.

2448.author: Denis Waitley
2448.quote: Losers make promises they often break. Winners make commitments they always keep.

2449.author: Denis Waitley
2449.quote: Failure should be our teacher, not our undertaker. Failure is delay, not defeat. It is a temporary detour, not a dead end. Failure is something we can avoid only by saying nothing, doing nothing, and being nothing.

2450.author: Denis Waitley
2450.quote: You must continue to gain expertise, but avoid thinking like an expert.

2451.author: Denis Waitley
2451.quote: There are two primary choices in life: to accept conditions as they exist, or accept the responsibility for changing them.

2452.author: Denis Waitley
2452.quote: Change the changeable, accept the unchangeable, and remove yourself from the unacceptable.

2453.author: Denis Waitley
2453.quote: Get excited and enthusiastic about you own dream. This excitement is like a forest fire - you can smell it, taste it, and see it from a mile away.

2454.author: Denis Waitley
2454.quote: Winners have the ability to step back from the canvas of their lives like an artist gaining perspective. They make their lives a work of art - an individual masterpiece.

2455.author: Denis Waitley
2455.quote: You must welcome change as the rule but not as your ruler.

2456.author: Denis Waitley
2456.quote: If you believe you can, you probably can. If you believe you won't, you most assuredly won't. Belief is the ignition switch that gets you off the launching pad.

2457.author: Denis Waitley
2457.quote: Losers live in the past. Winners learn from the past and enjoy working in the present toward the future.

2458.author: Denis Waitley
2458.quote: Winners are people with definite purpose in life.

2459.author: Dennis Prager
2459.quote: Goodness is about character - integrity, honesty, kindness, generosity, moral courage, and the like. More than anything else, it is about how we treat other people.

2460.author: Dennis Prager
2460.quote: There is no limit to suffering human beings have been willing to inflict on others, no matter how innocent, no matter how young, and no matter how old. This fact must lead all reasonable human beings, that is, all human beings who take evidence seriously, to draw only one possible conclusion: Human nature is not basically good.

2461.author: Dennis Prager
2461.quote: Happiness is dependent on self-discipline. We are the biggest obstacles to our own happiness. It is much easier to do battle with society and with others than to fight our own nature.

2462.author: Dennis Prager
2462.quote: The biggest obstacle to people becoming better is that you have to really want to be a good person in order to be a better person, and most people would rather be other things.

2463.author: Dennis Prager
2463.quote: As you get older and wiser you realize that when people are given anything without having to earn it (unless they are physically or mentally utterly incapable of earning anything), they become ungrateful and lazy. They also become less happy.

2464.author: Dennis Prager
2464.quote: Our scientific age demands that we provide definitions, measurements, and statistics in order to be taken seriously. Yet most of the important things in life cannot be precisely defined or measured. Can we define or measure love, beauty, friendship, or decency, for example?

2465.author: Dennis Prager
2465.quote: Of all the characteristics needed for both a happy and morally decent life, none surpasses gratitude. Grateful people are happier, and grateful people are more morally decent.

2466.author: Dennis Prager
2466.quote: I have never written that there is a threat of fascism in America. I always considered the idea overwrought. But now I believe there really is such a threat - and it will come draped not in an American flag, but in the name of tolerance and health.

2467.author: Dennis Prager
2467.quote: There was a time when liberalism was identified with anti-Communism. But the Vietnam War led liberals into the arms of the Left, which had been morally confused about Communism since its inception and had become essentially pacifist following the carnage of World War I.

2468.author: Dennis Prager
2468.quote: Hamas is a terrorist organization dedicated to annihilating the Jewish state. It runs a theocratic totalitarian state in Gaza, with no individual liberty, and no freedom of speech or press.

2469.author: Dennis Prager
2469.quote: Those who believe in nothing are very, very jealous and angry at those who believe in something.

2470.author: Dennis Prager
2470.quote: Even non-democratic allies no longer trust America. Barack Obama has alienated our most important and longest standing Arab allies, Egypt and Saudi Arabia. Both the anti-Muslim Brotherhood and the anti-Iran Arab states have lost respect for him.

2471.author: Dennis Prager
2471.quote: If there is no God, the labels 'good' and 'evil' are merely opinions. They are substitutes for 'I like it' and 'I don't like it.' They are not objective realities.

2472.author: Dennis Prager
2472.quote: Conservatives divide the world in terms of good and evil while liberals do it in terms of the rich and poor.

2473.author: Dennis Prager
2473.quote: Rather than dividing the world between good and evil, the Left divided the world in terms of economics. Economic classes, not moral values, explained human behavior. Therefore, to cite a common example, poverty, not one's moral value system, or lack of it, caused crime.

2474.author: Dennis Prager
2474.quote: If we weren't born with anti-social passions - narcissism, envy, lust, meanness, greed, hunger for power, just to name the more obvious - why the need for so many laws, whether religious or secular, that govern behavior?

2475.author: Dennis Prager
2475.quote: People confuse goodness with weakness. It is weak people, not good people (goodness demands strength), who are taken advantage of.

2476.author: Dennis Prager
2476.quote: To deny that human beings are filled with anti-social passions betrays a denial of reality and a lack of self-awareness. One has to be taught nonsense for a great many formative years to believe it.

2477.author: Dennis Prager
2477.quote: Much of the world's moral compass is broken. The moral north reads south and the moral south reads north.

2478.author: Dennis Prager
2478.quote: If anything, we older people yearn for a peaceful world even more than young people do. We are the ones who lost friends or relatives in some war. We are the ones who have lived a lifetime of seeing and reading about human suffering.

2479.author: Dennis Prager
2479.quote: In a lifetime of observing and participating in political debate, I have seen a lot of meanness.

2480.author: Dennis Prager
2480.quote: From their teenage years on, children are considerably more capable of causing parents unhappiness than bringing them happiness. That is one reason parents who rely on their children for happiness make both their children and themselves miserable.

2481.author: Dennis Prager
2481.quote: When watching 'The Passion,' Jews and Christians are watching two entirely different films. For two hours, Christians watch their Savior tortured and killed. For the same two hours, Jews watch Jews arrange the killing and torture of the Christians' Savior.

2482.author: Dennis Prager
2482.quote: Most women are not programmed to prefer a great career to a great man and a family. They feel they were sold a bill of goods at college and by the media.

2483.author: Dennis Prager
2483.quote: In little more than a generation, feminism has obliterated roles. If you wonder why so many men choose not to get married, the answer lies in large part in the contemporary devaluation of the husband and of the father - of men as men, in other words.

2484.author: Dennis Prager
2484.quote: The Left has always sought single, non-values-based explanations for human behavior.

2485.author: Desiderius Erasmus
2485.quote: Give light, and the darkness will disappear of itself.

2488.author: Desiderius Erasmus
2488.quote: In the kingdom of the blind, the one-eyed man is king.

2489.author: Desiderius Erasmus
2489.quote: By a Carpenter mankind was made, and only by that Carpenter can mankind be remade.

2490.author: Desiderius Erasmus
2490.quote: A nail is driven out by another nail. Habit is overcome by habit.

2491.author: Desiderius Erasmus
2491.quote: Reflection is a flower of the mind, giving out wholesome fragrance; but revelry is the same flower, when rank and running to seed.

2492.author: Desiderius Erasmus
2492.quote: Now I believe I can hear the philosophers protesting that it can only be misery to live in folly, illusion, deception and ignorance, but it isn't -it's human.

2493.author: Desiderius Erasmus
2493.quote: There are some people who live in a dream world, and there are some who face reality; and then there are those who turn one into the other.

2494.author: Desiderius Erasmus
2494.quote: Man is to man either a god or a wolf.

2495.author: Desiderius Erasmus
2495.quote: What difference is there, do you think, between those in Plato's cave who can only marvel at the shadows and images of various objects, provided they are content and don't know what they miss, and the philosopher who has emerged from the cave and sees the real things?

2496.author: Desiderius Erasmus
2496.quote: Great eagerness in the pursuit of wealth, pleasure, or honor, cannot exist without sin.

2497.author: Desiderius Erasmus
2497.quote: Nothing is as peevish and pedantic as men's judgments of one another.

2498.author: Desiderius Erasmus
2498.quote: What is popularly called fame is nothing but an empty name and a legacy from paganism.

2499.author: Desiderius Erasmus
2499.quote: Nowadays the rage for possession has got to such a pitch that there is nothing in the realm of nature, whether sacred or profane, out of which profit cannot be squeezed.

2500.author: Desiderius Erasmus
2500.quote: He who allows oppression shares the crime.

2501.author: Desiderius Erasmus
2501.quote: When I get a little money I buy books; and if any is left I buy food and clothes.

2502.author: Desiderius Erasmus
2502.quote: If you keep thinking about what you want to do or what you hope will happen, you don't do it, and it won't happen.

2503.author: Desiderius Erasmus
2503.quote: Man's mind is so formed that it is far more susceptible to falsehood than to truth.

2505.author: Desiderius Erasmus
