6132.quote: Obviously, as you grow up, no one's ever 100 percent proud of every decision that they've made, and that's OK. I think as long as you learn from your mistakes and don't make them over and over again, you're on the right path.

6133.author: Kim Kardashian
6133.quote: Maybe my fairy tale has a different ending than I dreamed it would. But that's OK.

6134.author: Kim Kardashian
6134.quote: If I don't feel confident about my body, I'm not going to sit at home and feel sorry for myself and not do something about it. It's all about taking action and not being lazy. So you do the work, whether it's fitness or whatever. It's about getting up, motivating yourself and just doing it.

6135.author: Kim Kardashian
6135.quote: When there's so many haters and negative things, I really don't care.

6136.author: Kim Kardashian
6136.quote: Having lots of siblings is like having built-in best friends.

6137.author: Kim Kardashian
6137.quote: It's fun to have a partner who understands your life and lets you be you.

6138.author: Kim Kardashian
6138.quote: I love when people underestimate me and then become pleasantly surprised.

6139.author: Kim Kardashian
6139.quote: I love the sun but don't have the time to get a good tan and keep it year-round, so I am a huge fan of tanning products.

6140.author: Kim Kardashian
6140.quote: I'm an entrepreneur. 'Ambitious' is my middle name.

6141.author: Kim Kardashian
6141.quote: My theory is, 'Happy mommy, happy baby.'

6142.author: Kim Kardashian
6142.quote: I'm not trying to influence anyone else; I'm not saying, 'Do what I do.' I think it's a little pretentious to say, 'I'm a role model'; I would never say that, and I don't think of myself that way.

6143.author: Kim Kardashian
6143.quote: To look and feel my best, I watch my calories and exercise.

6145.author: Kim Kardashian
6145.quote: I think I'll always be a hopeless romantic.

6146.author: Kim Kardashian
6146.quote: Holidays are the best. I couldn't imagine being from a small family.

6147.author: Kim Kardashian
6147.quote: Personally, I've always loved the curvy look.

6148.author: Kim Kardashian
6148.quote: I get letters from little girls begging me to adopt them.

6149.author: Kim Kardashian
6149.quote: The perfect date for me would be staying at home, making a big picnic in bed, eating Wotsits and cookies while watching cable TV.

6150.author: Kim Kardashian
6150.quote: You never know what the future holds or where my life will take me.

6151.author: Kim Kardashian
6151.quote: I couldn't sacrifice my heart for a publicity stunt.

6153.author: Kim Kardashian
6153.quote: I just feel my best when I'm all glammed up.

6154.author: Kim Kardashian
6154.quote: I'm a really nostalgic person. I love taking photos and video and having memories. I remember all my childhood videos that my dad used to take. I think that's really what life is about - especially when you start a family of your own.

6155.author: Kim Kardashian
6155.quote: If I like a food, I'll eat it, even if I know it's not good for me.

6156.author: Kobe Bryant
6156.quote: Everything negative - pressure, challenges - is all an opportunity for me to rise.

6157.author: Kobe Bryant
6157.quote: I have self-doubt. I have insecurity. I have fear of failure. I have nights when I show up at the arena and I'm like, 'My back hurts, my feet hurt, my knees hurt. I don't have it. I just want to chill.' We all have self-doubt. You don't deny it, but you also don't capitulate to it. You embrace it.

6158.author: Kobe Bryant
6158.quote: The most important thing is to try and inspire people so that they can be great in whatever they want to do.

6159.author: Kobe Bryant
6159.quote: If you're afraid to fail, then you're probably going to fail.

6160.author: Kobe Bryant
6160.quote: Sports are such a great teacher. I think of everything they've taught me: camaraderie, humility, how to resolve differences.

6161.author: Kobe Bryant
6161.quote: The important thing is that your teammates have to know you're pulling for them and you really want them to be successful.

6162.author: Kobe Bryant
6162.quote: I'll do whatever it takes to win games, whether it's sitting on a bench waving a towel, handing a cup of water to a teammate, or hitting the game-winning shot.

6163.author: Kobe Bryant
6163.quote: I'm reflective only in the sense that I learn to move forward. I reflect with a purpose.

6165.author: Kobe Bryant
6165.quote: I can't relate to lazy people. We don't speak the same language. I don't understand you. I don't want to understand you.

6166.author: Kobe Bryant
6166.quote: The Black Mamba collection of watches is me: It is my alter ego, so to speak. As I mentioned before, it is sharp, cutting edge and sleek which are characteristics I try to apply when I'm out there on the basketball court.

6167.author: Kobe Bryant
6167.quote: These young guys are playing checkers. I'm out there playing chess.

6168.author: Kobe Bryant
6168.quote: Winning takes precedence over all. There's no gray area. No almosts.

6169.author: Kobe Bryant
6169.quote: I don't talk trash often, but when I do, I go for the jugular.

6170.author: Kobe Bryant
6170.quote: I've played with IVs before, during and after games. I've played with a broken hand, a sprained ankle, a torn shoulder, a fractured tooth, a severed lip, and a knee the size of a softball. I don't miss 15 games because of a toe injury that everybody knows wasn't that serious in the first place.

6171.author: Kobe Bryant
6171.quote: Everyone looks at your watch and it represents who you are, your values and your personal style.

6172.author: Kobe Bryant
6172.quote: I don't want to be the next Michael Jordan, I only want to be Kobe Bryant.

6173.author: Kobe Bryant
6173.quote: My parents are my backbone. Still are. They're the only group that will support you if you score zero or you score 40.

6174.author: Kobe Bryant
6174.quote: The topic of leadership is a touchy one. A lot of leaders fail because they don't have the bravery to touch that nerve or strike that chord. Throughout my years, I haven't had that fear.

6175.author: Kobe Bryant
6175.quote: Can I jump over two or three guys like I used to? No. Am I as fast as I used to be? No, but I still have the fundamentals and smarts. That's what enables me to still be a dominant player. As a kid growing up, I never skipped steps. I always worked on fundamentals because I know athleticism is fleeting.

6176.author: Kobe Bryant
6176.quote: People just don't understand how obsessed I am with winning.

6177.author: Kobe Bryant
6177.quote: I'm not the most patient of people.

6178.author: Kobe Bryant
6178.quote: I'm extremely willful to win, and I respond to challenges. Scoring titles and stuff like that... it sounds, well, I don't care how it sounds - to me, scoring comes easy. It's not a challenge to me to win the scoring title, because I know I can.

6179.author: Kobe Bryant
6179.quote: I focus on one thing and one thing only - that's trying to win as many championships as I can.

6180.author: Kobe Bryant
6180.quote: In an individual sport, yes, you have to win titles. Baseball's different. But basketball, hockey? One person can control the tempo of a game, can completely alter the momentum of a series. There's a lot of great individual talent.

6181.author: Kobe Bryant
6181.quote: I'm here. I'm not going anywhere. No matter what the injury - unless it's completely debilitating - I'm going to be the same player I've always been. I'll figure it out. I'll make some tweaks, some changes, but I'm still coming.

6182.author: Kurt Cobain
6182.quote: The duty of youth is to challenge corruption.

6183.author: Kurt Cobain
6183.quote: The sun is gone, but I have a light.

6184.author: Kurt Cobain
6184.quote: I'd rather be hated for who I am, than loved for who I am not.

6185.author: Kurt Cobain
6185.quote: Wanting to be someone else is a waste of the person you are.

6186.author: Kurt Cobain
6186.quote: Punk is musical freedom. It's saying, doing and playing what you want. In Webster's terms, 'nirvana' means freedom from pain, suffering and the external world, and that's pretty close to my definition of Punk Rock.

6187.author: Kurt Cobain
6187.quote: If it's illegal to rock and roll, throw my ass in jail!

6188.author: Kurt Cobain
6188.quote: I'm so happy because today I found my friends - they're in my head.

6189.author: Kurt Cobain
6189.quote: If you die you're completely happy and your soul somewhere lives on. I'm not afraid of dying. Total peace after death, becoming someone else is the best hope I've got.

6190.author: Kurt Cobain
6190.quote: There's nothing better than having a baby. I've always loved children. I used to work summers at the YMCA and be in charge of, like, 30 preschool kids. I knew that when I had a child, I'd be overwhelmed, and it's true... I can't tell you how much my attitude has changed since we've got Frances. Holding my baby is the best drug in the world.

6191.author: Kurt Cobain
6191.quote: A friend is nothing but a known enemy.

6192.author: Kurt Cobain
6192.quote: I never wanted to sing. I just wanted to play rhythm guitar - hide in the back and just play.

6193.author: Kurt Cobain
6193.quote: My body is damaged from music in two ways. I have a red irritation in my stomach. It's psychosomatic, caused by all the anger and the screaming. I have scoliosis, where the curvature of your spine is bent, and the weight of my guitar has made it worse. I'm always in pain, and that adds to the anger in our music.

6194.author: Kurt Cobain
6194.quote: I wanted to have the adoration of John Lennon but have the anonymity of Ringo Starr. I didn't want to be a frontman. I just wanted to be back there and still be a rock and roll star at the same time.

6195.author: Kurt Cobain
6195.quote: Rap music is the only vital form of music introduced since punk rock.

6196.author: Kurt Cobain
6196.quote: Drugs are a waste of time. They destroy your memory and your self-respect and everything that goes along with with your self-esteem. They're no good at all.

6198.author: Kurt Cobain
6198.quote: I'm not well-read, but when I read, I read well.

6199.author: Kurt Cobain
6199.quote: We have no right to express an opinion until we know all of the answers.

6200.author: Kurt Cobain
6200.quote: I like to make people feel happy and superior in their reaction towards my appearance.

6201.author: Kurt Cobain
6201.quote: I like to have strong opinions with nothing to back them up with besides my primal sincerity. I like sincerity. I lack sincerity.

6202.author: Kurt Cobain
6202.quote: I bought a gun and chose drugs instead.

6203.author: Kurt Cobain
6203.quote: Throughout my life, I've always been really close with girls and made friends with girls. And I've always been a really sickly, feminine person anyhow, so I thought I was gay for a while because I didn't find any of the girls in my high school attractive at all.

6204.author: Kurt Cobain
6204.quote: We're so trendy we can't even escape ourselves.

6205.author: Kurt Cobain
6205.quote: It's okay to eat fish because they don't have any feelings.

6206.author: Kurt Cobain
6206.quote: I really miss being able to blend in with people.

6207.author: Kurt Cobain
6207.quote: I really haven't had that exciting of a life. There are a lot of things I wish I would have done, instead of just sitting around and complaining about having a boring life. So I pretty much like to make it up. I'd rather tell a story about somebody else.

6208.author: Kurt Vonnegut
6208.quote: Laughter and tears are both responses to frustration and exhaustion. I myself prefer to laugh, since there is less cleaning up to do afterward.

6209.author: Kurt Vonnegut
6209.quote: I want to stand as close to the edge as I can without going over. Out on the edge you see all the kinds of things you can't see from the center.

6210.author: Kurt Vonnegut
6210.quote: True terror is to wake up one morning and discover that your high school class is running the country.

6211.author: Kurt Vonnegut
6211.quote: The arts are not a way to make a living. They are a very human way of making life more bearable. Practicing an art, no matter how well or badly, is a way to make your soul grow, for heaven's sake.

6212.author: Kurt Vonnegut
6212.quote: Here we are, trapped in the amber of the moment. There is no why.

6213.author: Kurt Vonnegut
6213.quote: This is Sunday, and the question arises, what'll I start tomorrow?

6214.author: Kurt Vonnegut
6214.quote: We are what we pretend to be, so we must be careful what we pretend to be.

6215.author: Kurt Vonnegut
6215.quote: I tell you, we are here on Earth to fart around, and don't let anybody tell you different.

6216.author: Kurt Vonnegut
6216.quote: New knowledge is the most valuable commodity on earth. The more truth we have to work with, the richer we become.

6217.author: Kurt Vonnegut
6217.quote: The year was 2081, and everyone was finally equal.

6218.author: Kurt Vonnegut
6218.quote: We could have saved the Earth but we were too damned cheap.

6219.author: Kurt Vonnegut
6219.quote: Anything can make me stop and look and wonder, and sometimes learn.

6220.author: Kurt Vonnegut
6220.quote: If you can do a half-assed job of anything, you're a one-eyed man in a kingdom of the blind.

6221.author: Kurt Vonnegut
6221.quote: There is never a shortage anywhere of lawyers eager to attack the First Amendment, as though it were nothing more than a clause in a lease from a crooked slumlord.

6222.author: Kurt Vonnegut
6222.quote: What should young people do with their lives today? Many things, obviously. But the most daring thing is to create stable communities in which the terrible disease of loneliness can be cured.

6223.author: Kurt Vonnegut
6223.quote: All time is all time. It does not change. It does not lend itself to warnings or explanations. It simply is.

6224.author: Kurt Vonnegut
6224.quote: One of the things that I tell beginning writers is this: If you describe a landscape, or a cityscape, or a seascape, always be sure to put a human figure somewhere in the scene. Why? Because readers are human beings, mostly interested in human beings. People are humanists. Most of them are humanists, that is.

6225.author: Kurt Vonnegut
6225.quote: I let the dog out, or I let him in, and we talk some. I let him know I like him, and he lets me know he likes me.

6227.author: Kurt Vonnegut
6227.quote: Everyone now knows how to find the meaning of life within himself. But mankind wasn't always so lucky. Less than a century ago, men and women did not have easy access to the puzzle boxes within them.

6228.author: Kurt Vonnegut
6228.quote: Oh, sure, we have another world war coming, and another great depression, but where are the leaders this time?

6229.author: Kurt Vonnegut
6229.quote: Human beings will be happier - not when they cure cancer or get to Mars or eliminate racial prejudice or flush Lake Erie but when they find ways to inhabit primitive communities again. That's my utopia.

6230.author: Kurt Vonnegut
6230.quote: Beware of the man who works hard to learn something, learns it, and finds himself no wiser than before.

6231.author: Kurt Vonnegut
6231.quote: What troubles me most about my lovely country is that its children are seldom taught that American freedom will vanish, if, when they grow up, and in the exercise of their duties as citizens, they insist that our courts and policemen and prisons be guided by divine or natural law.

6232.author: Kurt Vonnegut
6232.quote: When a man becomes a writer, I think he takes on a sacred obligation to produce beauty and enlightenment and comfort at top speed.

6233.author: Kurt Vonnegut
6233.quote: People have to talk about something just to keep their voice boxes in working order so they'll have good voice boxes in case there's ever anything really meaningful to say.

6234.author: Lady Gaga
6234.quote: I've been searching for ways to heal myself, and I've found that kindness is the best way.

6235.author: Lady Gaga
6235.quote: Whether I'm wearing lots of makeup or no makeup, I'm always the same person inside.

6236.author: Lady Gaga
6236.quote: I allow myself to fail. I allow myself to break. I'm not afraid of my flaws.

6237.author: Lady Gaga
6237.quote: There is something in the way that we are now, with our cell phones, and people are not looking at each other and not being in the moment with each other, that kids feel isolated.

6238.author: Lady Gaga
6238.quote: The only big things I've purchased are my dad's heart valve and a Rolls-Royce for my parents, for their anniversary. And that was only because my dad had a Lady Gaga license plate on our old car and it was making me crazy because he was getting followed everywhere, so I bought him a new car.

6239.author: Lady Gaga
6239.quote: I think tolerance and acceptance and love is something that feeds every community.

6240.author: Lady Gaga
6240.quote: If you were to ask me what I want to do - I don't want to be a celebrity, I want to make a difference.

6241.author: Lady Gaga
6241.quote: I was very depressed when I was 19... I would go back to my apartment every day and I would just sit there. It was quiet and it was lonely. It was still. It was just my piano and myself. I had a television and I would leave it on all the time just to feel like somebody was hanging out with me.

6242.author: Lady Gaga
6242.quote: I miss people. I miss going anywhere and meeting a random person and saying 'Hi' and having a conversation about life. I love people.

6243.author: Lady Gaga
6243.quote: All the awards in the world, you can get into all the nightclubs, they'll send you the nicest clothes. Nothing better than walking into your dad's restaurant and seeing a smile on his face and knowing that your mom and dad and your sister are real proud of you.

6244.author: Lady Gaga
6244.quote: I feel like if you're a really good human being, you can try to find something beautiful in every single person, no matter what.

6245.author: Lady Gaga
6245.quote: Music is one of the most powerful things the world has to offer. No matter what race or religion or nationality or sexual orientation or gender that you are, it has the power to unite us.

6246.author: Lady Gaga
6246.quote: The Internet is a toilet. It is.

6247.author: Lady Gaga
6247.quote: I'm half living my life between reality and fantasy at all times.

6248.author: Lady Gaga
6248.quote: 'Born this Way' is about being yourself, and loving who you are and being proud.

6249.author: Lady Gaga
6249.quote: The darkness, the loop of negative thoughts on repeat, clamours and interferes with the music I hear in my head.

6250.author: Lady Gaga
6250.quote: I don't see myself in terms of artifice. I see myself as a real person who chooses to live my life in an open way - artistically.

6251.author: Lady Gaga
6251.quote: Because the sweeter the cake, the more bitter the jelly can be.

6252.author: Lady Gaga
6252.quote: I think what's important is for us to decipher what is honest and what is dishonest and be accepting of those things and not operating from fear.

6253.author: Lady Gaga
6253.quote: I'm not a sandwich store that only sells turkey sandwiches. I sell a lot of different things.

6254.author: Lady Gaga
6254.quote: I am my own sanctuary and I can be reborn as many times as I choose throughout my life.

6255.author: Lady Gaga
6255.quote: At the end of the day, who I really and truly am is a little girl who loved to play the piano.

6256.author: Lady Gaga
6256.quote: I actually don't want a throne at all, because I don't view myself as a queen; I view myself as one of my fans.

6257.author: Lady Gaga
6257.quote: I've been actually really very pleased to see how much awareness was raised around bullying, and how deeply it affects everyone. You know, you don't have to be the loser kid in high school to be bullied. Bullying and being picked on comes in so many different forms.

6259.author: Lady Gaga
6259.quote: I'm not one icon. I'm every icon. I'm an icon that is made out of all the colors on the palette at every time. I have no restrictions. No restrictions.

6260.author: Langston Hughes
6260.quote: Hold fast to dreams, for if dreams die, life is a broken-winged bird that cannot fly.

6261.author: Langston Hughes
6261.quote: Let the rain kiss you. Let the rain beat upon your head with silver liquid drops. Let the rain sing you a lullaby.

6262.author: Langston Hughes
6262.quote: Like a welcome summer rain, humor may suddenly cleanse and cool the earth, the air and you.

6263.author: Langston Hughes
6263.quote: Perhaps the mission of an artist is to interpret beauty to people - the beauty within themselves.

6264.author: Langston Hughes
6264.quote: I have discovered in life that there are ways of getting almost anywhere you want to go, if you really want to go.

6265.author: Langston Hughes
6265.quote: Jazz, to me, is one of the inherent expressions of Negro life in America: the eternal tom-tom beating in the Negro soul - the tom-tom of revolt against weariness in a white world, a world of subway trains, and work, work, work; the tom-tom of joy and laughter, and pain swallowed in a smile.

6266.author: Langston Hughes
6266.quote: Hold fast to dreams For when dreams go Life is a barren field Frozen with snow.

6267.author: Langston Hughes
6267.quote: Beauty for some provides escape, who gain a happiness in eyeing the gorgeous buttocks of the ape or Autumn sunsets exquisitely dying.

6268.author: Langston Hughes
6268.quote: I will not take 'but' for an answer.

6269.author: Langston Hughes
6269.quote: My writing has been largely concerned with the depicting of Negro life in America.

6270.author: Langston Hughes
6270.quote: Writing is like travelling. It's wonderful to go somewhere, but you get tired of staying.

6271.author: Langston Hughes
6271.quote: My soul has grown deep like the rivers.

6272.author: Langston Hughes
6272.quote: What happens to a dream deferred? Does it dry up Like a raisin in the sun? Or does it explode?

6273.author: Langston Hughes
6273.quote: We younger Negro artists who create now intend to express our individual dark-skinned selves without fear or shame. If white people are pleased, we are glad. If they are not, it doesn't matter. We know we are beautiful. And ugly too.

6274.author: Langston Hughes
6274.quote: In all my life, I have never been free. I have never been able to do anything with freedom, except in the field of my writing.

6275.author: Langston Hughes
6275.quote: When peoples care for you and cry for you, they can straighten out your soul.

6276.author: Langston Hughes
6276.quote: One of the great needs of Negro children is to have books about themselves and their lives that can help them be proud.

6277.author: Langston Hughes
6277.quote: I live in Harlem, New York City. I am unmarried. I like 'Tristan,' goat's milk, short novels, lyric poems, heat, simple folk, boats and bullfights; I dislike 'Aida,' parsnips, long novels, narrative poems, cold, pretentious folk, buses and bridges.

6278.author: Langston Hughes
6278.quote: To my mind, it is the duty of the younger Negro artist, if he accepts any duties at all from outsiders, to change through the force of his art that old whispering 'I want to be white,' hidden in the aspirations of his people, to 'Why should I want to be white? I am a Negro - and beautiful!'

6279.author: Langston Hughes
6279.quote: An artist must be free to choose what he does, certainly, but he must also never be afraid to do what he might choose.

6280.author: Langston Hughes
6280.quote: Humor is laughing at what you haven't got when you ought to have it.

6281.author: Langston Hughes
6281.quote: My personal experience has been that in my 25 years of writing, I have not been asked to do more than four or five commercial one-shot scripts. These were performed on major national hook-ups but produced for me no immediate additional jobs or requests. One script for BBC was done around the world with an all-star cast.

6282.author: Langston Hughes
6282.quote: I swear to the Lord, I still can't see, why Democracy means, everybody but me.

6283.author: Langston Hughes
6283.quote: Without going outside his race, and even among the better classes with their 'white' culture and conscious American manners, but still Negro enough to be different, there is sufficient matter to furnish a black artist with a lifetime of creative work.

6284.author: Langston Hughes
6284.quote: I was a victim of a stereotype. There were only two of us Negro kids in the whole class, and our English teacher was always stressing the importance of rhythm in poetry. Well, everybody knows - except us - that all Negroes have rhythms, so they elected me class poet.

6285.author: Langston Hughes
6285.quote: I must never write when I do not want to write.

6286.author: Lao Tzu
6286.quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.

6287.author: Lao Tzu
6287.quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.

6288.author: Lao Tzu
6288.quote: Kindness in words creates confidence. Kindness in thinking creates profoundness. Kindness in giving creates love.

6289.author: Lao Tzu
6289.quote: Do the difficult things while they are easy and do the great things while they are small. A journey of a thousand miles must begin with a single step.

6290.author: Lao Tzu
6290.quote: Silence is a source of great strength.

6291.author: Lao Tzu
6291.quote: When the best leader's work is done the people say, 'We did it ourselves.'

6292.author: Lao Tzu
6292.quote: Nothing is softer or more flexible than water, yet nothing can resist it.

6293.author: Lao Tzu
6293.quote: Life is a series of natural and spontaneous changes. Don't resist them - that only creates sorrow. Let reality be reality. Let things flow naturally forward in whatever way they like.

6294.author: Lao Tzu
6294.quote: If you do not change direction, you may end up where you are heading.

6295.author: Lao Tzu
6295.quote: The key to growth is the introduction of higher dimensions of consciousness into our awareness.

6296.author: Lao Tzu
6296.quote: I have just three things to teach: simplicity, patience, compassion. These three are your greatest treasures.

6297.author: Lao Tzu
6297.quote: Life and death are one thread, the same line viewed from different sides.

6298.author: Lao Tzu
6298.quote: Knowing others is wisdom, knowing yourself is Enlightenment.

6299.author: Lao Tzu
6299.quote: Treat those who are good with goodness, and also treat those who are not good with goodness. Thus goodness is attained. Be honest to those who are honest, and be also honest to those who are not honest. Thus honesty is attained.

6300.author: Lao Tzu
6300.quote: For the wise man looks into space and he knows there is no limited dimensions.

6301.author: Lao Tzu
6301.quote: A good traveler has no fixed plans, and is not intent on arriving.

6303.author: Lao Tzu
6303.quote: A leader is best when people barely know he exists, when his work is done, his aim fulfilled, they will say: we did it ourselves.

6304.author: Lao Tzu
6304.quote: To the mind that is still, the whole universe surrenders.

6305.author: Lao Tzu
6305.quote: When I let go of what I am, I become what I might be.

6306.author: Lao Tzu
6306.quote: Mastering others is strength. Mastering yourself is true power.

6307.author: Lao Tzu
6307.quote: Nature does not hurry, yet everything is accomplished.

6308.author: Lao Tzu
6308.quote: Governing a great nation is like cooking a small fish - too much handling will spoil it.

6309.author: Lao Tzu
6309.quote: Man's enemies are not demons, but human beings like himself.

6310.author: Lao Tzu
6310.quote: Be content with what you have; rejoice in the way things are. When you realize there is nothing lacking, the whole world belongs to you.

6311.author: Lao Tzu
6311.quote: Of all that is good, sublimity is supreme. Succeeding is the coming together of all that is beautiful. Furtherance is the agreement of all that is just. Perseverance is the foundation of all actions.

6312.author: LeBron James
6312.quote: I treated it like every day was my last day with a basketball.

6313.author: LeBron James
6313.quote: You have to be able to accept failure to get better.

6314.author: LeBron James
6314.quote: I like criticism. It makes you strong.

6315.author: LeBron James
6315.quote: My mom and I have always been there for each other. We had some tough times, but she was always there for me.

6316.author: LeBron James
6316.quote: You can't be afraid to fail. It's the only way you succeed - you're not gonna succeed all the time, and I know that.

6317.author: LeBron James
6317.quote: My father wasn't around when I was a kid, and I used to always say, 'Why me? Why don't I have a father? Why isn't he around? Why did he leave my mother?' But as I got older I looked deeper and thought, 'I don't know what my father was going through, but if he was around all the time, would I be who I am today?'

6318.author: LeBron James
6318.quote: I have short goals - to get better every day, to help my teammates every day - but my only ultimate goal is to win an NBA championship. It's all that matters. I dream about it. I dream about it all the time, how it would look, how it would feel. It would be so amazing.

6319.author: LeBron James
6319.quote: I think, team first. It allows me to succeed, it allows my team to succeed.

6320.author: LeBron James
6320.quote: When you have that respect from your teammates, it makes it a lot more comfortable.

6321.author: LeBron James
6321.quote: You know, God gave me a gift to do other things besides play the game of basketball.

6322.author: LeBron James
6322.quote: As a professional athlete a lot is going to be said about you - but I just try to move forward and try to achieve my goals.

6323.author: LeBron James
6323.quote: I'm going to use all my tools, my God-given ability, and make the best life I can with it.

6324.author: LeBron James
6324.quote: To all the positions, I just bring the determination to win. Me being an unselfish player, I think that can carry on to my teammates. When you have one of the best players on the court being unselfish, I think that transfers to the other players.

6325.author: LeBron James
6325.quote: For me, already being part of a single parent household and knowing it was just me and my mom, you'd would wake up times and hope that the next day you'd be able to be alongside your mother because she was out trying to make sure that I was taken care of. But all I cared about was her being home.

6326.author: LeBron James
6326.quote: You know, I'm just 6'9" and 260. And just so happen to be very good at playing the game of basketball.

6327.author: LeBron James
6327.quote: Every night on the court I give my all, and if I'm not giving 100 percent, I criticize myself.

6328.author: LeBron James
6328.quote: Basketball is my passion, I love it. But my family and friends mean everything to me. That's what's important. I need my phone so I can keep in contact with them at all times.

6329.author: LeBron James
6329.quote: Once you get on the playing field it's not about whether you're liked or not liked. All that matters is to play at a high level and do whatever it takes to help your team win. That's what it's about.

6330.author: LeBron James
6330.quote: Well, I mean, to me, I think my ultimate - my ultimate goal is winning championships and - and I understand that me going down as one of the greats will not happen until I, you know, win a championship.

6331.author: LeBron James
6331.quote: But sports carried me away from being in a gang, or being associated with drugs. Sports was my way out.

6332.author: LeBron James
6332.quote: I was a Chicago Bulls, Michael Jordan fan growing up.

6333.author: LeBron James
6333.quote: I've always been an unselfish guy, and that's the only way I know how to play on the court and I try to play to the maximum of my ability - not only for myself but for my teammates.

6334.author: LeBron James
6334.quote: I went through a lot of battles in high school.

6335.author: LeBron James
6335.quote: Where I grew up - I grew up on the north side of Akron, lived in the projects. So those scared and lonely nights - that's every night. You hear a lot of police sirens, you hear a lot of gunfire. Things that you don't want your kids to hear growing up.

6336.author: LeBron James
6336.quote: Volleyball, I could be pretty good. After a few practices I could be that striker, or whatever they call it.

6337.author: LeBron James
6337.quote: I need music. It's like my heartbeat, so to speak. It keeps me going no matter what's going on - bad games, press, whatever!

6338.author: Leo Buscaglia
6338.quote: Your talent is God's gift to you. What you do with it is your gift back to God.

6339.author: Leo Buscaglia
6339.quote: Change is the end result of all true learning.

6340.author: Leo Buscaglia
6340.quote: Too often we underestimate the power of a touch, a smile, a kind word, a listening ear, an honest compliment, or the smallest act of caring, all of which have the potential to turn a life around.

6341.author: Leo Buscaglia
6341.quote: A single rose can be my garden... a single friend, my world.

6342.author: Leo Buscaglia
6342.quote: Worry never robs tomorrow of its sorrow, it only saps today of its joy.

6343.author: Leo Buscaglia
6343.quote: Only the weak are cruel. Gentleness can only be expected from the strong.

6344.author: Leo Buscaglia
6344.quote: The fact that I can plant a seed and it becomes a flower, share a bit of knowledge and it becomes another's, smile at someone and receive a smile in return, are to me continual spiritual exercises.

6345.author: Leo Buscaglia
6345.quote: Love is life. And if you miss love, you miss life.

6346.author: Leo Buscaglia
6346.quote: Love is always bestowed as a gift - freely, willingly and without expectation. We don't love to be loved; we love to love.

6347.author: Leo Buscaglia
6347.quote: Never idealize others. They will never live up to your expectations.

6348.author: Leo Buscaglia
6348.quote: The purpose of life is to help others, and if you can't help them, won't you at least not hurt them? I know that is a platitude, that that is sentimental and can easily be attacked. But loving, caring is simple, and we make it complex. Our own neuroses make it complex.

6349.author: Leo Buscaglia
6349.quote: The easiest thing to be in the world is you. The most difficult thing to be is what other people want you to be. Don't let them put you in that position.

6350.author: Leo Buscaglia
6350.quote: Don't brood. Get on with living and loving. You don't have forever.

6351.author: Leo Buscaglia
6351.quote: Love always creates, it never destroys. In this lies man's only promise.

6352.author: Leo Buscaglia
6352.quote: If you're an advocate of gentleness, you're simplistic and naive. If you're an advocate of despair and hate, you're sophisticated.

6353.author: Leo Buscaglia
6353.quote: What we call the secret of happiness is no more a secret than our willingness to choose life.

6354.author: Leo Buscaglia
6354.quote: We are no longer puppets being manipulated by outside powerful forces: we become the powerful force ourselves.

6355.author: Leo Buscaglia
6355.quote: Life lived for tomorrow will always be just a day away from being realized.

6356.author: Leo Buscaglia
6356.quote: When we sit at the table, there is more going on than satisfying hunger. It is sad to think of those who eat simply to satisfy their hunger and who do not permit themselves to linger under the many spells offered by a good meal - the satisfaction of our hearts, our minds and our spirits.

6357.author: Leo Buscaglia
6357.quote: Death is a challenge. It tells us not to waste time... It tells us to tell each other right now that we love each other.

6358.author: Leo Buscaglia
6358.quote: Love is always open arms. If you close your arms about love you will find that you are left holding only yourself.

6359.author: Leo Buscaglia
6359.quote: I have a very strong feeling that the opposite of love is not hate - it's apathy. It's not giving a damn.

6361.author: Leo Buscaglia
6361.quote: What love we've given, we'll have forever. What love we fail to give, will be lost for all eternity.

6362.author: Leo Buscaglia
6362.quote: I have too much respect for people to try to control them. But they are estranged from love, afraid to reach out and touch one another. We're afraid to appear sentimental or speak in platitudes because people will say, 'What a jerk!' It takes courage in our culture to be a lover.

6363.author: Leo Buscaglia
6363.quote: All of my youth growing up in my Italian family was focused around the table. That's where I learned about love.

6364.author: Leo Tolstoy
6364.quote: The two most powerful warriors are patience and time.

6365.author: Leo Tolstoy
6365.quote: There is no greatness where there is no simplicity, goodness and truth.

6366.author: Leo Tolstoy
6366.quote: An arrogant person considers himself perfect. This is the chief harm of arrogance. It interferes with a person's main task in life - becoming a better person.

6367.author: Leo Tolstoy
6367.quote: Everyone thinks of changing the world, but no one thinks of changing himself.

6368.author: Leo Tolstoy
6368.quote: The sole meaning of life is to serve humanity.

6369.author: Leo Tolstoy
6369.quote: Art is not a handicraft, it is the transmission of feeling the artist has experienced.

6370.author: Leo Tolstoy
6370.quote: If you want to be happy, be.

6371.author: Leo Tolstoy
6371.quote: All happy families resemble one another, each unhappy family is unhappy in its own way.

6372.author: Leo Tolstoy
6372.quote: Music is the shorthand of emotion.

6373.author: Leo Tolstoy
6373.quote: Truth, like gold, is to be obtained not by its growth, but by washing away from it all that is not gold.

6376.author: Leo Tolstoy
6376.quote: Without knowing what I am and why I am here, life is impossible.

6377.author: Leo Tolstoy
6377.quote: All, everything that I understand, I understand only because I love.

6378.author: Leo Tolstoy
6378.quote: In the name of God, stop a moment, cease your work, look around you.

6379.author: Leo Tolstoy
6379.quote: True life is lived when tiny changes occur.

6380.author: Leo Tolstoy
6380.quote: Even in the valley of the shadow of death, two and two do not make six.

6381.author: Leo Tolstoy
6381.quote: A man can live and be healthy without killing animals for food; therefore, if he eats meat, he participates in taking animal life merely for the sake of his appetite.

6382.author: Leo Tolstoy
6382.quote: All violence consists in some people forcing others, under threat of suffering or death, to do what they do not want to do.

6383.author: Leo Tolstoy
6383.quote: We must not only cease our present desire for the growth of the state, but we must desire its decrease, its weakening.

6384.author: Leo Tolstoy
6384.quote: Historians are like deaf people who go on answering questions that no one has asked them.

6385.author: Leo Tolstoy
6385.quote: It is amazing how complete is the delusion that beauty is goodness.

6386.author: Leo Tolstoy
6386.quote: Joy can only be real if people look upon their life as a service and have a definite object in life outside themselves and their personal happiness.

6387.author: Leo Tolstoy
6387.quote: One of the first conditions of happiness is that the link between Man and Nature shall not be broken.

6388.author: Leo Tolstoy
6388.quote: We lost because we told ourselves we lost.

6389.author: Leo Tolstoy
6389.quote: I sit on a man's back, choking him and making him carry me, and yet assure myself and others that I am very sorry for him and wish to ease his lot by all possible means - except by getting off his back.

6390.author: Leonard Cohen
6390.quote: There is a crack in everything, that's how the light gets in.

6391.author: Leonard Cohen
6391.quote: This world is full of conflicts and full of things that cannot be reconciled. But there are moments when we can... reconcile and embrace the whole mess, and that's what I mean by 'Hallelujah.'

6392.author: Leonard Cohen
6392.quote: I like life on the road. It's a lot easier than civilian life. You kind of feel like you're in a motorcycle gang.

6393.author: Leonard Cohen
6393.quote: The older I get, the surer I am that I'm not running the show.

6394.author: Leonard Cohen
6394.quote: Poetry is just the evidence of life. If your life is burning well, poetry is just the ash.

6395.author: Leonard Cohen
6395.quote: We're in a world where there's famine and hunger and people are dodging bullets and having their nails pulled out in dungeons so it's very hard for me to place any high value on the work that I do to write a song. Yeah, I work hard but compared to what?

6396.author: Leonard Cohen
6396.quote: Act the way you'd like to be and soon you'll be the way you act.

6397.author: Leonard Cohen
6397.quote: I don't consider myself a pessimist. I think of a pessimist as someone who is waiting for it to rain. And I feel soaked to the skin.

6398.author: Leonard Cohen
6398.quote: Out of the thousands who are known or who want to be known as poets, maybe one or two are genuine and the rest are fakes, hanging around the sacred precincts, trying to look like the real thing.

6399.author: Leonard Cohen
6399.quote: When things get really bad, just raise your glass and stamp your feet and do a little jig. That's about all you can do.

6400.author: Leonard Cohen
6400.quote: My mind was always very cluttered, so I took great pains to simplify my environment, because if my environment were half as cluttered as my mind, I wouldn't be able to make it from room to room.

6401.author: Leonard Cohen
6401.quote: In dreams the truth is learned that all good works are done in the absence of a caress.

6402.author: Leonard Cohen
6402.quote: Let judges secretly despair of justice: their verdicts will be more acute. Let generals secretly despair of triumph; killing will be defamed. Let priests secretly despair of faith: their compassion will be true.

6403.author: Leonard Cohen
6403.quote: Music is the emotional life of most people.

6404.author: Leonard Cohen
6404.quote: A woman watches her body uneasily, as though it were an unreliable ally in the battle for love.

6405.author: Leonard Cohen
6405.quote: We're always experiencing joy or sadness. But there are lots of people who've closed down. And there are times in one's life when one has to close down just to regroup.

6406.author: Leonard Cohen
6406.quote: I don't really understand that process called reincarnation but if there is such a thing I'd like to come back as my daughter's dog.

6408.author: Leonard Cohen
6408.quote: The last refuge of the insomniac is a sense of superiority to the sleeping world.

6409.author: Leonard Cohen
6409.quote: To every people the land is given on condition. Perceived or not, there is a Covenant, beyond the constitution, beyond sovereign guarantee, beyond the nation's sweetest dreams of itself.

6410.author: Leonard Cohen
6410.quote: You can keep the body as well-oiled and receptive as possible, but whether you're actually going to be able to go for the long haul is really not your own choice.

6411.author: Leonard Cohen
6411.quote: There's always a group of songs that I'm working at. Some of them are 10 years old, and some of them are just a few weeks old. I'm always trying to adjust these songs to some position where I can bring them to completion.

6412.author: Leonard Cohen
6412.quote: I can make a couple of good sandwiches: tuna salad and chopped egg salad. And Greek bean soup. I was a cook for my old Zen master for many years. So there were two or three dishes that he liked, you know. Teriyaki salmon, a few things.

6413.author: Leonard Cohen
6413.quote: I am an old scholar, better-looking now than when I was young. That's what sitting on your ass does to your face.

6414.author: Leonard Cohen
6414.quote: And most people have a woman in their heart, most men have a woman in their heart and most women have a man in their heart.

6415.author: Leonard Cohen
6415.quote: The term clinical depression finds its way into too many conversations these days. One has a sense that a catastrophe has occurred in the psychic landscape.

6416.author: Leonardo da Vinci
6416.quote: Tears come from the heart and not from the brain.

6417.author: Leonardo da Vinci
6417.quote: While I thought that I was learning how to live, I have been learning how to die.

6418.author: Leonardo da Vinci
6418.quote: I love those who can smile in trouble, who can gather strength from distress, and grow brave by reflection. 'Tis the business of little minds to shrink, but they whose heart is firm, and whose conscience approves their conduct, will pursue their principles unto death.

6420.author: Leonardo da Vinci
6420.quote: Water is the driving force of all nature.

6422.author: Leonardo da Vinci
6422.quote: As a well-spent day brings happy sleep, so a life well spent brings happy death.

6423.author: Leonardo da Vinci
6423.quote: The greatest deception men suffer is from their own opinions.

6424.author: Leonardo da Vinci
6424.quote: The noblest pleasure is the joy of understanding.

6425.author: Leonardo da Vinci
6425.quote: For once you have tasted flight you will walk the earth with your eyes turned skywards, for there you have been and there you will long to return.

6426.author: Leonardo da Vinci
6426.quote: Why does the eye see a thing more clearly in dreams than the imagination when awake?

6427.author: Leonardo da Vinci
6427.quote: The beginnings and ends of shadow lie between the light and darkness and may be infinitely diminished and infinitely increased. Shadow is the means by which bodies display their form. The forms of bodies could not be understood in detail but for shadow.

6428.author: Leonardo da Vinci
6428.quote: I have been impressed with the urgency of doing. Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Being willing is not enough; we must do.

6429.author: Leonardo da Vinci
6429.quote: Medicine is the restoration of discordant elements; sickness is the discord of the elements infused into the living body.

6430.author: Leonardo da Vinci
6430.quote: He who loves practice without theory is like the sailor who boards ship without a rudder and compass and never knows where he may cast.

6431.author: Leonardo da Vinci
6431.quote: There are three classes of people: those who see, those who see when they are shown, those who do not see.

6432.author: Leonardo da Vinci
6432.quote: A beautiful body perishes, but a work of art dies not.

6433.author: Leonardo da Vinci
6433.quote: Where the spirit does not work with the hand, there is no art.

6435.author: Leonardo da Vinci
6435.quote: Nature is the source of all true knowledge. She has her own logic, her own laws, she has no effect without cause nor invention without necessity.

6436.author: Leonardo da Vinci
6436.quote: Where there is shouting, there is no true knowledge.

6437.author: Leonardo da Vinci
6437.quote: Iron rusts from disuse; water loses its purity from stagnation... even so does inaction sap the vigor of the mind.

6438.author: Leonardo da Vinci
6438.quote: Nothing strengthens authority so much as silence.

6439.author: Leonardo da Vinci
6439.quote: The length of a man's outspread arms is equal to his height.

6440.author: Leonardo da Vinci
6440.quote: Poor is the pupil who does not surpass his master.

6441.author: Leonardo da Vinci
6441.quote: The human foot is a masterpiece of engineering and a work of art.

6442.author: Les Brown
6442.quote: Your smile will give you a positive countenance that will make people feel comfortable around you.

6443.author: Les Brown
6443.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.

6444.author: Les Brown
6444.quote: Shoot for the moon and if you miss you will still be among the stars.

6445.author: Les Brown
6445.quote: Forgive yourself for your faults and your mistakes and move on.

6446.author: Les Brown
6446.quote: In every day, there are 1,440 minutes. That means we have 1,440 daily opportunities to make a positive impact.

6447.author: Les Brown
6447.quote: Help others achieve their dreams and you will achieve yours.

6448.author: Les Brown
6448.quote: Forgive those who have hurt you.

6449.author: Les Brown
6449.quote: Review your goals twice every day in order to be focused on achieving them.

6450.author: Les Brown
6450.quote: Don't let someone else's opinion of you become your reality.

6451.author: Les Brown
6451.quote: If you set goals and go after them with all the determination you can muster, your gifts will take you places that will amaze you.

6452.author: Les Brown
6452.quote: You must remain focused on your journey to greatness.

6453.author: Les Brown
6453.quote: We were all born with a certain degree of power. The key to success is discovering this innate power and using it daily to deal with whatever challenges come our way.

6454.author: Les Brown
6454.quote: Your goals are the road maps that guide you and show you what is possible for your life.

6455.author: Les Brown
6455.quote: Wanting something is not enough. You must hunger for it. Your motivation must be absolutely compelling in order to overcome the obstacles that will invariably come your way.

6456.author: Les Brown
6456.quote: The only limits to the possibilities in your life tomorrow are the buts you use today.

6457.author: Les Brown
6457.quote: When life knocks you down, try to land on your back. Because if you can look up, you can get up. Let your reason get you back up.

6458.author: Les Brown
6458.quote: Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears.

6459.author: Les Brown
6459.quote: Make each day count by setting specific goals to succeed, then putting forth every effort to exceed your own expectations.

6460.author: Les Brown
6460.quote: Our ability to handle life's challenges is a measure of our strength of character.

6461.author: Les Brown
6461.quote: We have to live life with a sense of urgency so not a minute is wasted.

6462.author: Les Brown
6462.quote: You cannot expect to achieve new goals or move beyond your present circumstances unless you change.

6464.author: Les Brown
6464.quote: If you put yourself in a position where you have to stretch outside your comfort zone, then you are forced to expand your consciousness.

6465.author: Les Brown
6465.quote: If you take responsibility for yourself you will develop a hunger to accomplish your dreams.

6466.author: Les Brown
6466.quote: Where do we enroll in Life 101? Where are the classes dealing with the loss of a job, the death of a loved one, the failure of a relationship? Unfortunately, those lessons are mostly learned through trial by fire and the school of hard knocks.

6467.author: Les Brown
6467.quote: Life takes on meaning when you become motivated, set goals and charge after them in an unstoppable manner.

6468.author: Lewis Carroll
6468.quote: One of the secrets of life is that all that is really worth the doing is what we do for others.

6469.author: Lewis Carroll
6469.quote: If you don't know where you are going, any road will get you there.

6470.author: Lewis Carroll
6470.quote: I can't go back to yesterday - because I was a different person then.

6471.author: Lewis Carroll
6471.quote: While the laughter of joy is in full harmony with our deeper life, the laughter of amusement should be kept apart from it. The danger is too great of thus learning to look at solemn things in a spirit of mockery, and to seek in them opportunities for exercising wit.

6472.author: Lewis Carroll
6472.quote: Begin at the beginning and go on till you come to the end; then stop.

6473.author: Lewis Carroll
6473.quote: Contrariwise, if it was so, it might be; and if it were so, it would be; but as it isn't, it ain't. That's logic.

6474.author: Lewis Carroll
6474.quote: She generally gave herself very good advice, (though she very seldom followed it).

6475.author: Lewis Carroll
6475.quote: Sometimes I've believed as many as six impossible things before breakfast.

6476.author: Lewis Carroll
6476.quote: It's a poor sort of memory that only works backwards.

6477.author: Lewis Carroll
6477.quote: That's the reason they're called lessons, because they lesson from day to day.

6479.author: Lewis Carroll
6479.quote: No good fish goes anywhere without a porpoise.

6480.author: Lewis Carroll
6480.quote: Who in the world am I? Ah, that's the great puzzle.

6481.author: Lewis Carroll
6481.quote: Twinkle, twinkle little bat How I wonder what you're at! Up above the world you fly, Like a tea-tray in the sky.

6482.author: Lewis Carroll
6482.quote: 'The time has come,' the walrus said, 'to talk of many things: of shoes and ships - and sealing wax - of cabbages and kings.'

6483.author: Lewis Carroll
6483.quote: We called him Tortoise because he taught us.

6484.author: Lewis Carroll
6484.quote: Always speak the truth, think before you speak, and write it down afterwards.

6485.author: Lewis Carroll
6485.quote: Take care of the sense and the sounds will take care of themselves.

6486.author: Lewis Carroll
6486.quote: There comes a pause, for human strength will not endure to dance without cessation; and everyone must reach the point at length of absolute prostration.

6487.author: Lewis Carroll
6487.quote: 'But I don't want to go among mad people,' said Alice. 'Oh, you can't help that,' said the cat. 'We're all mad here.'

6488.author: Lewis Carroll
6488.quote: There are three hundred and sixty-four days when you might get un-birthday presents, and only one for birthday presents, you know.

6489.author: Lewis Carroll
6489.quote: Everything's got a moral, if only you can find it.

6490.author: Lewis Carroll
6490.quote: 'What is the use of a book', thought Alice, 'without pictures or conversations?'

6491.author: Lewis Carroll
6491.quote: Why, sometimes I've believed as many as six impossible things before breakfast.

6492.author: Lewis Carroll
6492.quote: 'When I use a word,' Humpty Dumpty said in rather a scornful tone, 'it means just what I choose it to mean - neither more nor less.'

6493.author: Lewis Carroll
6493.quote: Which form of proverb do you prefer Better late than never, or Better never than late?

6494.author: Lil Uzi Vert
6494.quote: I'm just doing me, and to me, that's what got me this far.

6495.author: Lil Uzi Vert
6495.quote: If you're you, it doesn't matter if you're the most boring person in the world: someone will like you. You're not trying to be anyone else.

6496.author: Lil Uzi Vert
6496.quote: I got different moods. Like, if I'm in a good mood, I listen to 'Up' by Thug. If I'm not in a good mood, I'll listen to 'King TROUP' - that's a real emotional one.

6497.author: Lil Uzi Vert
6497.quote: Don't get me wrong: school is good and all, but school is way too slow for me. Like, super slow. So I didn't want to go. I wanted to learn on my own with real life experiences.

6498.author: Lil Uzi Vert
6498.quote: I stopped thinking; I just go out, and everything is in the moment. I just stop thinking and start moving - you just gotta be you.

6499.author: Lil Uzi Vert
6499.quote: I like to look cool and dress nice. Lil Uzi is a rock star. Just know that.

6500.author: Lil Uzi Vert
6500.quote: I want to be as big as I can be. I want to be one of the biggest artists. I want to be remembered like, 'He is crazy. He is phenomenal.' I just want to be one of the biggest.

6501.author: Lil Uzi Vert
6501.quote: One thing I could tell you is that I'm all over the place.

6502.author: Lil Uzi Vert
6502.quote: A whole bunch of 'ayes' and a whole bunch of 'yeahs.' That's it. That's all I do. I say yeah. I tell myself that I'm not gon' go over 80. I say, like, 79 yeahs, and it works. We what you call mumble rappers. So you say 'yeah' after everything and make it rhyme no matter what it is.

6503.author: Lil Uzi Vert
6503.quote: One thing rap and rock have in common, a lot of it is focused on negativity. I like dark stuff.

6504.author: Lil Uzi Vert
6504.quote: There are always people who are into the old way of doing things. I don't think it's a bad thing necessarily, but things change - nothing stays the same. If you can stay true to yourself, you're always going to be legendary.

6505.author: Lil Uzi Vert
6505.quote: 'Vert' is, like, straight to the top, like a vertical leap.

6506.author: Lil Uzi Vert
6506.quote: I just want to be successful. I'm not going to sit here and be like, 'I want to win a Grammy' or whatever; if that comes, that's awesome. But I just want to be successful and provide for my whole family and get my family out the hood.

6507.author: Lil Uzi Vert
6507.quote: The type of music I make, it's not just straight-up rapping. There's emotion in it. That's why people feel each song differently. I get all my vibes from rock music, you know? All my melodies and all that.

6508.author: Lil Uzi Vert
6508.quote: There's enough money for everybody. See, I can't do what Yachty does. But then again, Yachty can't do what I do.

6509.author: Lil Uzi Vert
6509.quote: I saw Marilyn Manson. He had, like, the platinum grills, and that's when I got my first ones. And honestly, I didn't even buy them. My grandma bought those. I paid her back right away, though.

6510.author: Lil Uzi Vert
6510.quote: The first album I bought, I didn't even buy it. My grandma got Mike Jones and Bow Wow's 'Wanted' a little later. Matter of fact Ying Yang Twins' 'U.S.A. Still United' was the first album, but Mike Jones was the first album I really love.

6511.author: Lil Uzi Vert
6511.quote: I'm a real big Marilyn Manson fan. I get a lot of my styles from him. Not even musically - living-wise, too. Marilyn Manson definitely shows me you shouldn't care what nobody say. I watched a bunch of his interviews, and he's not just an artist; he's one of the most intelligent people I ever saw in my life.

6512.author: Lil Uzi Vert
6512.quote: There's a lot of haters in Philly, but it's a lot of people that give you support - but way more haters. It's definitely a great city to be from. But it's not really a lot of people that come out of there. So when you, like, make it out of Philadelphia, everywhere else is easy.

6513.author: Lil Uzi Vert
6513.quote: You can't say I look like this person or sound like this person exactly because I made it my own. I'm pretty, pretty influenced by myself right now.

6514.author: Lil Uzi Vert
6514.quote: The thing that makes me different from any other rapper is that I usually talk real crazy in my songs.

6515.author: Lil Uzi Vert
6515.quote: I played the coronet first, and then I upgraded to the trumpet. First song I learned on there was 'Hot Cross Buns.'

6516.author: Lil Uzi Vert
6516.quote: Mike Jones, Ying Yang Twins, then a little later, Wiz Khalifa and Meek Mill, too. It was the repetitive stuff with Mike Jones when he would give out his number, and I also like his style. Back then, actually, I still think du-rags, grillz, and stuff like that are cool.

6517.author: Lil Uzi Vert
6517.quote: I got a lot of influences. I got relevant influences today. I got influences that you wouldn't even think of. I'm very influenced by Marilyn Manson. His style is ridiculous. Like, honestly, if you want me to keep it 100, Marilyn Manson has as much style as Kanye West and Pharrell Williams.

6518.author: Lil Uzi Vert
6518.quote: I really didn't want to rap; I was just a regular kid.

6519.author: Lil Uzi Vert
6519.quote: I really didn't want to rap; I was just a regular kid. My friend - his name is William Aston - we went to the same high school together, and he was rapping. He put out a freestyle over Chris Brown's 'Look at Me Now,' and it was fire, and the whole school went crazy.

6520.author: Lil Wayne
6520.quote: I'm blessed and I thank God for every day for everything that happens for me.

6521.author: Lil Wayne
6521.quote: I like people that enjoy life, 'cause I do the same.

6522.author: Lil Wayne
6522.quote: I'm a gangster, and gangsters don't ask questions.

6523.author: Lil Wayne
6523.quote: I always believe that to be the best, you have to smell like the best, dress like the best, act like the best. When you throw your trash in the garbage can, it has to be better than anybody else who ever threw trash in the garbage can.

6524.author: Lil Wayne
6524.quote: Don't make an opinion on me if you don't know nothin' about me.

6525.author: Lil Wayne
6525.quote: Don't judge me. You wanna judge me, put on a black gown and get a gavel. Get in line with the rest of them that's about to judge me. I got court dates every other month. It's me against the world - that's how I feel.

6526.author: Lil Wayne
6526.quote: I am very humble, and I am very gracious and very grateful for everything that happens to me and about me and around me.

6527.author: Lil Wayne
6527.quote: I don't want to be understood because if people understand me, they get tired of me.

6528.author: Lil Wayne
6528.quote: Life is a lot like skateboarding.

6529.author: Lil Wayne
6529.quote: I don't take nothin' from no one. I do what I wanna do. And I'm gonna do that until the day I die. And if I can't do that, then I'll just die.

6530.author: Lil Wayne
6530.quote: The more time you spend contemplating what you should have done... you lose valuable time planning what you can and will do.

6531.author: Lil Wayne
6531.quote: We're here to live. We're here to do, we're here to be.

6532.author: Lil Wayne
6532.quote: I know it's an experience that I need to have if God's putting me through it.

6533.author: Lil Wayne
6533.quote: I don't look for signs. But when things happen, I say, 'OK, something must be right.' Or 'OK, something must be wrong.'

6534.author: Lil Wayne
6534.quote: I'm an addict, I'm addicted to success. Thankfully, there's no rehab for success.

6535.author: Lil Wayne
6535.quote: Trying to tear down the past prohibits you from building up your future.

6536.author: Lil Wayne
6536.quote: I just always expect the best because I'm a competitor and if I'm competing, then obviously I'm trying to be better in everything.

6537.author: Lil Wayne
6537.quote: I just feel out of this world sometimes.

6538.author: Lil Wayne
6538.quote: The most bizarre thing I've ever read about myself is that I was dead. That was kind of weird to read that I'm dead - mostly because I was reading it.

6539.author: Lil Wayne
6539.quote: I was still in school after I dropped my first solo album.

6540.author: Lil Wayne
6540.quote: Hate is only a form love that hasn't found a way to express itself logically.

6541.author: Lil Wayne
6541.quote: You're either living or you're dead.

6542.author: Lil Wayne
6542.quote: I look at things as 'Everything is meant to be.'

6543.author: Lil Wayne
6543.quote: I do not consider myself a literal genius.

6544.author: Lil Wayne
6544.quote: As long as people remember me forever, that will be enough for me.

6546.author: Linda Sanchez
6546.quote: For too long, our society has shrugged off bullying by labeling it a 'rite of passage' and by asking students to simply 'get over it.' Those attitudes need to change. Every day, students are bullied into silence and are afraid to speak up. Let's break this silence and end school bullying.

6547.author: Linda Sanchez
6547.quote: A lot about Congress is about forming good working relationships with people, and humor can really help you do that.

6548.author: Linda Sanchez
6548.quote: At the end of the day I'm just Linda, and Linda is a single professional woman, and a lot of women can relate to what I talk about.

6549.author: Linda Sanchez
6549.quote: Latinas are the fastest growing segment of the minority population, and their perspective deserves to be represented, not denigrated.

6550.author: Linda Sanchez
6550.quote: When so-called child's play turns hostile, and a child becomes a victim, it is time to act. Victims of cyberbullying do not choose to participate. Rather than build character, bullying can cause children to become anxious, fearful, unhappy, and even cause them to be physically sick.

6551.author: Linda Sanchez
6551.quote: I feel sometimes that there's this sense that people are poor because they want to be, or they're working-class because they want to be or because they don't work hard enough. I feel like there's this demonization of working people in general, but specifically definitely labor union members.

6552.author: Linda Sanchez
6552.quote: You can't be the perfect member of Congress and the perfect mother 100 percent of the time. And probably, you'd be a pretty annoying person if you were.

6553.author: Linda Sanchez
6553.quote: As a member of Congress, I'm often reminded that in baseball, as in diplomacy, you have to know when to hit, when to run, and when to show grace.

6554.author: Linda Sanchez
6554.quote: I've used my experience from playing sports in almost every aspect of my life. Playing soccer is where I found my voice, and playing softball was where I learned precision, and in every game I learned to play as a member of a team - to work not for my own glory, but for a shared goal.

6555.author: Linda Sanchez
6555.quote: Latinos are concerned about the same pocketbook issues that matter to most middle class Americans - creating good-paying jobs in this country, making sure our children get a quality education, and ensuring that our families have access to affordable and quality healthcare.

6556.author: Linda Sanchez
6556.quote: I have to tell you, I live paycheck to paycheck like most Americans. It's very difficult for me to say, 'Hey, I can give up my paycheck,' because the reality is, I have financial obligations that I have to meet on a month-to-month basis that doesn't make it possible for me.

6557.author: Linda Sanchez
6557.quote: I am a big proponent of adopting dogs through shelters and rescue operations. Having dogs in the office might not be right for everyone, but it has certainly worked well for me. My advice to other offices, on the Hill and off, would be to try it out.

6558.author: Linda Sanchez
6558.quote: Gender equality cannot be achieved by cutting programs that allow girls to get the same chance to compete, learn, and play. The United States has had a solid history of commitment to its female athletes and expanding opportunity for women, and it is imperative that we continue on this path.

6559.author: Linda Sanchez
6559.quote: Congresswomen are congresswomen - you are, sorry. And for women who want to be congressmen, there's a screw loose in their head. I'm proud of being a woman. I think 'congresswoman' is the appropriate term, and 'Madame chair' is just fine with me.

6560.author: Linda Sanchez
6560.quote: I think most Americans would agree that we need sensible solutions that fix our immigration system and deal humanely with aspiring citizens currently in our country. At the same time, these solutions must increase the security of our borders.

6561.author: Linda Sanchez
6561.quote: Getting guns off the streets does make communities safer. We can't stand here and say because we don't have the perfect solution, we shouldn't try.

6562.author: Lord Byron
6562.quote: There is pleasure in the pathless woods, there is rapture in the lonely shore, there is society where none intrudes, by the deep sea, and music in its roar; I love not Man the less, but Nature more.

6563.author: Lord Byron
6563.quote: Always laugh when you can. It is cheap medicine.

6564.author: Lord Byron
6564.quote: Ye stars! which are the poetry of heaven!

6565.author: Lord Byron
6565.quote: Be thou the rainbow in the storms of life. The evening beam that smiles the clouds away, and tints tomorrow with prophetic ray.

6566.author: Lord Byron
6566.quote: Yes, love indeed is light from heaven; A spark of that immortal fire with angels shared, by Allah given to lift from earth our low desire.

6567.author: Lord Byron
6567.quote: The great art of life is sensation, to feel that we exist, even in pain.

6568.author: Lord Byron
6568.quote: Friendship may, and often does, grow into love, but love never subsides into friendship.

6569.author: Lord Byron
6569.quote: I only go out to get me a fresh appetite for being alone.

6570.author: Lord Byron
6570.quote: The heart will break, but broken live on.

6571.author: Lord Byron
6571.quote: Roll on, deep and dark blue ocean, roll. Ten thousand fleets sweep over thee in vain. Man marks the earth with ruin, but his control stops with the shore.

6572.author: Lord Byron
6572.quote: Fools are my theme, let satire be my song.

6573.author: Lord Byron
6573.quote: There are four questions of value in life, Don Octavio. What is sacred? Of what is the spirit made? What is worth living for and what is worth dying for? The answer to each is the same. Only love.

6574.author: Lord Byron
6574.quote: The dew of compassion is a tear.

6575.author: Lord Byron
6575.quote: Man, being reasonable, must get drunk; the best of life is but intoxication.

6576.author: Lord Byron
6576.quote: There is no instinct like that of the heart.

6577.author: Lord Byron
6577.quote: I have great hopes that we shall love each other all our lives as much as if we had never married at all.

6578.author: Lord Byron
6578.quote: If I could always read, I should never feel the want of company.

6579.author: Lord Byron
6579.quote: Love will find a way through paths where wolves fear to prey.

6580.author: Lord Byron
6580.quote: Adversity is the first path to truth.

6581.author: Lord Byron
6581.quote: Those who will not reason, are bigots, those who cannot, are fools, and those who dare not, are slaves.

6582.author: Lord Byron
6582.quote: Why I came here, I know not; where I shall go it is useless to inquire - in the midst of myriads of the living and the dead worlds, stars, systems, infinity, why should I be anxious about an atom?

6583.author: Lord Byron
6583.quote: Between two worlds life hovers like a star, twixt night and morn, upon the horizon's verge.

6584.author: Lord Byron
6584.quote: Friendship is Love without his wings!

6585.author: Lord Byron
6585.quote: There is no such thing as a life of passion any more than a continuous earthquake, or an eternal fever. Besides, who would ever shave themselves in such a state?

6586.author: Lord Byron
6586.quote: Fame is the thirst of youth.

6587.author: Lord Byron
6587.quote: There is something pagan in me that I cannot shake off. In short, I deny nothing, but doubt everything.

6588.author: Lou Holtz
6588.quote: I follow three rules: Do the right thing, do the best you can, and always show people you care.

6589.author: Lou Holtz
6589.quote: Ability is what you're capable of doing. Motivation determines what you do. Attitude determines how well you do it.

6590.author: Lou Holtz
6590.quote: Virtually nothing is impossible in this world if you just put your mind to it and maintain a positive attitude.

6591.author: Lou Holtz
6591.quote: Do right. Do your best. Treat others as you want to be treated.

6592.author: Lou Holtz
6592.quote: Nothing on this earth is standing still. It's either growing or it's dying. No matter if it's a tree or a human being.

6593.author: Lou Holtz
6593.quote: Winners embrace hard work. They love the discipline of it, the trade-off they're making to win. Losers, on the other hand, see it as punishment. And that's the difference.

6594.author: Lou Holtz
6594.quote: Life is ten percent what happens to you and ninety percent how you respond to it.

6595.author: Lou Holtz
6595.quote: Everyone goes through adversity in life, but what matters is how you learn from it.

6596.author: Lou Holtz
6596.quote: It's not the load that breaks you down, it's the way you carry it.

6597.author: Lou Holtz
6597.quote: Successful people will always tell you you can do something. It's the people who have never accomplished anything who will always discourage you from trying to achieve excellent things.

6598.author: Lou Holtz
6598.quote: I never learn anything talking. I only learn things when I ask questions.

6599.author: Lou Holtz
6599.quote: How you respond to the challenge in the second half will determine what you become after the game, whether you are a winner or a loser.

6600.author: Lou Holtz
6600.quote: You aren't going to find anybody that's going to be successful without making a sacrifice and without perseverance.

6601.author: Lou Holtz
6601.quote: In the successful organization, no detail is too small to escape close attention.

6602.author: Lou Holtz
6602.quote: Motivation is simple. You eliminate those who are not motivated.

6603.author: Lou Holtz
6603.quote: Show me someone who has done something worthwhile, and I'll show you someone who has overcome adversity.

6604.author: Lou Holtz
6604.quote: Sacrifice, discipline and prayer are essential. We gain strength through God's word. We receive grace from the sacrament. And when we fumble due to sin - and it's gonna happen - confession puts us back on the field.

6605.author: Lou Holtz
6605.quote: No one has ever drowned in sweat.

6606.author: Lou Holtz
6606.quote: I think life is a matter of choices and that wherever we are, good or bad, is because of choices we make.

6607.author: Lou Holtz
6607.quote: I do know this: God does answer your prayers, but it's not always in the way you expect. God knows what's best for us, though, so there's no need to worry when things don't go how we originally wanted them to go.

6608.author: Lou Holtz
6608.quote: I can't believe that God put us on this earth to be ordinary.

6609.author: Lou Holtz
6609.quote: If Tiger Woods had played football, he would have been a quarterback.

6610.author: Lou Holtz
6610.quote: I used to pray that God would make me a great athlete, and He never did.

6611.author: Lou Holtz
6611.quote: I think that we have opportunities all around us - sometimes we just don't recognize them.

6612.author: Lou Holtz
6612.quote: We were at a beach one summer, and I had a bathing suit on. My wife looked at me and said: 'Boy, you are skinny, aren't you?' I said: 'Honey, I'd like to remind you that it was minor defects like this that kept me from getting a better wife.'

6613.author: Lou Holtz
6613.quote: The man who complains about the way the ball bounces is likely the one who dropped it.

6614.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca
6614.quote: One of the most beautiful qualities of true friendship is to understand and to be understood.

6615.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca
6615.quote: Wherever there is a human being, there is an opportunity for a kindness.

6616.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca
6616.quote: Brave men rejoice in adversity, just as brave soldiers triumph in war.

6617.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca
6617.quote: True happiness is... to enjoy the present, without anxious dependence upon the future.

6618.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca
6618.quote: It is a rough road that leads to the heights of greatness.

6619.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca
6619.quote: Luck is a matter of preparation meeting opportunity.

6620.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca
6620.quote: A happy life is one which is in accordance with its own nature.

6621.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca
6621.quote: A gem cannot be polished without friction, nor a man perfected without trials.

6622.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca
6622.quote: It is quality rather than quantity that matters.

6623.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca
6623.quote: Love in its essence is spiritual fire.

6624.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca
6624.quote: If one does not know to which port one is sailing, no wind is favorable.

6625.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca
6625.quote: A sword never kills anybody; it is a tool in the killer's hand.

6626.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca
6626.quote: A gift consists not in what is done or given, but in the intention of the giver or doer.

6627.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca
6627.quote: The first and greatest punishment of the sinner is the conscience of sin.

6628.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca
6628.quote: The day which we fear as our last is but the birthday of eternity.

6629.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca
6629.quote: Life's like a play: it's not the length, but the excellence of the acting that matters.

6630.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca
6630.quote: The pressure of adversity does not affect the mind of the brave man... It is more powerful than external circumstances.

6631.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca
6631.quote: The less we deserve good fortune, the more we hope for it.

6632.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca
6632.quote: Anger, if not restrained, is frequently more hurtful to us than the injury that provokes it.

6633.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca
6633.quote: It is not because things are difficult that we do not dare, it is because we do not dare that they are difficult.

6634.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca
6634.quote: If a man knows not what harbor he seeks, any wind is the right wind.

6635.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca
6635.quote: We are more often frightened than hurt; and we suffer more from imagination than from reality.

6637.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca
6637.quote: The bravest sight in the world is to see a great man struggling against adversity.

6638.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca
6638.quote: He who is brave is free.

6639.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca
6639.quote: Every guilty person is his own hangman.

6640.author: Ludwig van Beethoven
6640.quote: Music should strike fire from the heart of man, and bring tears from the eyes of woman.

6641.author: Ludwig van Beethoven
6641.quote: Music is the mediator between the spiritual and the sensual life.

6642.author: Ludwig van Beethoven
6642.quote: The true artist is not proud: he unfortunately sees that art has no limits; he feels darkly how far he is from the goal, and though he may be admired by others, he is sad not to have reached that point to which his better genius only appears as a distant, guiding sun.

6643.author: Ludwig van Beethoven
6643.quote: Only the pure in heart can make a good soup.

6644.author: Ludwig van Beethoven
6644.quote: Art! Who comprehends her? With whom can one consult concerning this great goddess?

6645.author: Ludwig van Beethoven
6645.quote: Nothing is more intolerable than to have to admit to yourself your own errors.

6646.author: Ludwig van Beethoven
6646.quote: I will seize fate by the throat; it shall certainly never wholly overcome me.

6647.author: Ludwig van Beethoven
6647.quote: Music is a higher revelation than all wisdom and philosophy.

6648.author: Ludwig van Beethoven
6648.quote: This is the mark of a really admirable man: steadfastness in the face of trouble.

6649.author: Ludwig van Beethoven
6649.quote: Don't only practice your art, but force your way into its secrets; art deserves that, for it and knowledge can raise man to the Divine.

6650.author: Ludwig van Beethoven
6650.quote: Tones sound, and roar and storm about me until I have set them down in notes.

6651.author: Ludwig van Beethoven
6651.quote: I must confess that I lead a miserable life. For almost two years, I have ceased to attend any social functions, just because I find it impossible to say to people, 'I am deaf.' If I had any other profession, I might be able to cope with my infirmity; but in my profession, it is a terrible handicap.

6652.author: Ludwig van Beethoven
6652.quote: Music comes to me more readily than words.

6653.author: Ludwig van Beethoven
6653.quote: O, you men who think or say that I am malevolent, stubborn or misanthropic, how greatly do you wrong me. You do not know the secret cause which makes me seem that way to you, and I would have ended my life - it was only my art that held me back. Ah, it seemed impossible to leave the world until I had brought forth all that I felt was within me.

6654.author: Ludwig van Beethoven
6654.quote: Recommend virtue to your children; it alone, not money, can make them happy. I speak from experience.
